item.text: @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma d+h+yA ma ka hr-i da ya kA ri kA / bod skad du/ dbu ma'i snying po'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis
de nyid rab brtag min/ /rnam shes bya min gzhi ma yin/ /mtshon min brtag min rig bya min/ /skye 'jig med cing bde ba dang / /rnam brtag ma yin snang ba med / /mtshan ma med cing gsal
byed med/ /gnyis min gnyis med ma yin dang / /zhi dang blo 'jug spangs pa dang / /yi ge med pa yi ge yis/ /thugs rje nyid kyis bstan mdzad pa/ /ston pa ma nor nyid gsung ba/ /de
la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan don bsgrub phyir brtul zhugs kyis/ /byang chub chen por blos byas rnams/ /de nyid bdud rtsir gzung ba'i phyir/ /nus pas cung zhig brjod par bya/ /byang
chub sems ni mi gtong dang / /thub pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag brtan / /de nyid shes pa tshol ba ni/ /don kun sgrub pa'i spyod pa yin/ /byams pa dang ni snying rje dang / /shes pa chen pos
brgyan pa yi/ /sangs rgyas sa bon byang chub sems/ /de phyir mkhas pas de mi gtang / /blo ldan snying stobs che ba dang / /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal mi bzod cing / /yang dag
brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / /mthu dang ldan zhing mkhas pas ni/ /shes rab snang ba med pa yi/ /'jig rten kun la blta byas nas/ /'khor ba mi gtsang sa 'og nas/ /bdag nyid brgal bas
bsgral bar rigs/ /gang zhig shes rab mtshon rnon gyis/ /'ching ba kun bcad grol gyur pa/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid ldan pa yis/ /gang phyir mgon med sdug bsngal ba/ /'khor ba'i btson ra mi
bzad par/ /'dod chags la sogs sgrog gis bcings/ /bag med pa yi chang 'thungs nas/ /gti mug gnyid kyis log pa dang / /rnam par rtog pa'i chom rkun gyis/ /dge tshogs ma lus brkus
pa dag /gal te grol bar mi byed na/ /mthu ldan mthu ni ci la phan/ /gang zhig lag pa'i mthus bsgrubs pa/ /'dod pas bskyed pa'i bde chung yang / /gcig pu gdu bas za byed pa/ /de yang mkhas pas

smad 'gyur na/ /'khor los sgyur dang dbang po dang / /tshangs pa la yang rab bkod pa/ /sred pa rnam par gcod pa dang / /thabs kyi sgo nas thun mong ba/ /len dang zad dang mthar thug dang / /sdug la sogs pas mi 'gyur zhing / /sdug bsngal ma lus zhi byed pa'i/ /

de nyid don rtogs bdud rtsi ci/ /gzhan yang sngon chad nyon mongs pa'i/ /gdon gyis brlams pa bdag gis ni/ /rma la 'gyur byed 'debs pa bzhin/ /sdug bsngal nad pa gang sdug byas/ /skye ba gzhan du gang dag gis/ /byams dang bsnyen bkur phan pa byas/ /de

la lan du phan gdags pa/ /mya ngan bzla las gzhan ci yod/ /gzhan don byed las byung ba yi/ /dga' bas sems dga' mkhas pa dag /ral gri rab tu 'bar 'dra ba'i/ /srid pa dag gis gnod mi 'gyur/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa mi byed pas/ /ngan 'gro'i

sgo kun bcad pa'i phyir/ /stong nyid lta ba goms byas pas/ /nyon mongs 'jug pa bcom phyir ro/ /mkhas pa bsod nams byas pa yis/ /'gro drug bskyed tshal dus ston ltar/ /mthong ba srid pa'i btson ra yis/ /skrag par 'gyur ba yod ma yin/ /skyon mthong phyir ni

srid par min/ /brtse phyir mya ngan 'das mi gnas/ /gzhan don bsgrub phyir brtul zhugs can/ /srid pa na yang gnas par byed/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /gnyis dang gnyis min mi dmigs pa'i/ /mkhas pa gar yang mi gnas shing / /srid pa na yang

gnas par byed/ /byang lag rin chen bdun phyug cing / /yon tan dpag med 'byung ba'i gnas/ /lha dang lha min phyag byas pa/ /dam chos 'khor lo bskor brnyes shing / /mu tig 'pho 'dra'i grags pa dang / /ston zla nya ba'i dri med pa'i/ /'od zer lta bu'i gsung dag

gis/ /phyogs bcu dag ni rgyas mdzad la/ /dkon mchog gsum gdung gnas bya'i phyir/ /yon tan 'byung gnas dam pa'i sras/ /lha klu la sogs spyi gtsug gis/ /bstan pa mchod pa bzhag mdzad de/ /rang dang gzhan don mdzad pa'i phyir/ /de dag mya ngan 'das legs

'das/ /de las gzhan gang lus bcud chad/ /de yang mya ngan 'das pa yin/ /wa ni glang chen dregs pa yi/ /glad pa 'gems shing dbye mi sems/ /gdol pa rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor bskyang mi sems/ /de bzhin sems can

dman pa yang / /zab cing bla med rgya che ba/ /yon tan bgrang 'das 'byung ba'i gnas/ /sangs rgyas nyid la re ba'ang med/ /gzhal yas rmad byung bsam mi khyab/ /snang ba thams cad zil gnon pa/ /rdzogs sangs yon tan rin chen la/ /su zhig yid kyis sems mi

bskyed/ /gzhan don byed pa dpa' ba dang / /skyes bu chen po'i tshul ldan pa/ /su zhig 'khor mtha' med par yang / /nyin gcig lta bur gnas mi byed/ /mkhas pa gang zhig 'das gyur kyang / /gang gis gtam gzhi 'phel 'gyur ba/ /'phags pa gzhan don mdzad

rnams kyi/ /lam gyi rjes su 'jug mi byed/ /su zhig chu shing dbu ba ltar/ /snying po med pa'i lus 'di dag /gzhan phan rkyen du sgrub byed pas/ /lhun po snying por sgrub mi byed/ /ya rabs snying rje ldan pas ni/ /skad cig re re rga shi dang / /nad kyi gzhir gyur lus dag ni/ /

gzhan la bde skyid gzhir byed do/ /dam chos sgron ma dang bcas la/ /mi khom brgyad spangs khom pa 'di/ /skyes bu chen po'i spyod pa yis/ /'bras bu yod par bya ba'i rigs/ /dbu ma'i snying po las byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de ltar

'gro la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub chen por brtan blangs pa/ /tshul dang mthun pa'i lam nyid du/ /rab tu zhugs pa rnam par mdzes/ /de ni byams pa gnod med dang / /snying rje phan pa bsgrub pa yis/ /dam chos rtogs pa ngoms med dang / /chos sbyin pa la ser sna med/ /

drang dang nga rgyal bcom pa dang / /yid kyis de nyid blta ba dang / /gzhan skyon rtog la long ba dang / /rang skyon 'byung bas 'jigs pa yin/ /rtsod dang 'jig rten 'du 'dzi dang / /'jig rten rgyang pan rgyab kyis phyogs/ /yon tan med la'ang yon tan gyi/ /rgyun rnams skye

bar rtag tu gus/ /snying rjes bskyed pa'i sbyin pa dag /skye bo'i tshogs rnams thams cad kyi/ /sdug bsngal chu bo kun zhi'i phyir/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid 'dod pa skyed / /tshul khrims dri med chus khrus dang / /bzod pa'i se ral phreng dkar dang / /brtson 'grus ral pa'i

khur bcings dang / /bsam gtan shes pa lhur len te/ /blo mig legs par bye ba dang / /bstan bcos 'jig rten shes la mkhas/ /ngo tsha khrel yod gos dang ni/ /des pa'i ska rags 'ching ba yin/ /snying rje'i pags pa gnag 'chang zhing / /dad pa dri med ril ba

dang / /dran pas dbang po'i sgo bsrungs shing / /brtan pa'i sba stegs stan la 'dug /theg pa chen po dga' chen gyi/ /dka' thub nags tshal yang dag bsten/ /bsam gtan dga' ba'i 'bras bu za/ /dran pa nyer gzhag spyod yul can/ /zab cing rgya che mdo sde'i mtha'/ /

'don cing sdig pa bcom pa dang / /bden pa gnyis la brten pa yi/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung nyi bshad zlos/ /sgrub pa'i me tog bsngags ldan pa/ /phyogs rnams kun du dris khyab pas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma la/ /nyin gcig bzhin du bsnyen bkur byed/ /so sor rtog pa'i

me thab tu/ /mi dge'i kun du rtog pa sreg /bla med go 'phang thob bya'i phyir/ /de ltar thub pa'i brtul zhugs spyod/ /dbu ma'i snying po las thub pa'i brtul zhugs la yang dag par bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //gang la shes pa'i mig yod pa/ /de la mig yod gzhan ma yin/ /

des na gang phyir blo ldan dag /de nyid shes pa tshol ba brtson/ /blo ldan 'jig rten gsum po dag /thogs med mthong ba long bas kyang / /blta 'dod thag ring cha phra dang / /bsgribs pa'i don yang mthong bar 'gyur/ /mig stong pa yang blo med na/ /mig dang ldan pa ma yin te/ /mtho ris

dang ni byang grol gyi/ /lam dang lam min mi mthong phyir/ /shes rab mig bye mthong ba dang / /ma mthong khyad par 'dod pa yi/ /'bras bu re ba dug tsher gyi/ /sbyin pa sogs la 'jug mi byed/ /snying rjes thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyir/ /'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yi/ /sbyin

la sogs la brtson byed cing / /de la 'ang yid ni gnas mi byed/ /shes rab bdud rtsi ngoms byed dang / /sgron ma snang ba thogs med dang / /thar pa'i khang bzangs them skas dang / /nyon mongs bud shing sreg pa'i me/ /blo gros de yang bden gnyis la/ /ltos

nas rnam pa gnyis su 'dod/ /yang dag don rtogs rjes mthun phyir/ /yang dag kun rdzob shes pa yin/ /sbyin dang bsod nams ye shes kyi/ /tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs byed dang / /rgyu de dag gi 'bras bu dang / /'brel dang mtshan nyid la sogs shes/ /byams dang snying rje

bsgom pa dang / /sems can sdud dang smin byed dang / /skye mched bcu gnyis brten pa yi/ /shes rab brdar btags shes par bya/ /rtog pa'i dra ba ma lus pa/ /dgag pa sgrub par byed pa dang / /zhi dang so so rang rig dang / /rnam rtog med cing yi ge med/ /gcig nyid tha dad

nyid bral dang / /mkha' ltar dri med de nyid la/ /'jug pa med pas 'jug pa yi/ /shes rab don dam shes pa yin/ /yang dag kun rdzob rnams kyi skas/ /med par yang dag khang pa yi/ /steng du 'gro bar bya ba ni/ /mkhas la rung ba ma yin no/ /de nyid khang bzangs thog 'dzeg

pa/ /yang dag kun rdzob them pa'i skas/ /med par rung ba ma yin pa/ /gang gi phyir ba de phyir ro/ /mkhas pas sems ni mnyam gzhag phyir/ /mngon par brtson pa nyid du bya/ /de bzhin thos byung shes pa la/ /de las gzhan shes rgyu phyir ro/ /ji ltar chu rnyog g.yo ba la/ /bzhin ni

mthong bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de ltar sems mnyam ma bzhag dang / /sgrib pas bsgribs la de nyid do/ /yid kyi glang po log 'gro ba/ /dmigs pa'i ka ba brtan po la/ /dran pa'i thag pas nges bcings nas/ /shes rab lcags kyus rim dbang bya/ /rgod pa mi rtag la sogs pa/ /yid la byed pas

zhi bar bya/ /zhum pa dmigs pa rgya chen dag /bsgom pas spang ba nyid du bya/ /g.yengs pas g.yeng ba'i mtshan ma la/ /nyes dmigs blta bas bsdu bar bya/ /zhum pa yang ni brtson 'grus kyi/ /phan yon mthong bas gzengs bstod bya/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi /rdzab dris sbags

shing ma bsdams pa/ /mi sdug byams pa rten 'byung ba'i/ /chu dag gis ni bkru bar bya/ /dben zhing mi g.yo zhi ba dang / /dmigs pa dag la gzhol ba dang / /las su rung zhing mnyen shes nas/ /de la legs par btang snyoms bya/ /blo gros mnyam gzhag 'og tu ni/ /tha snyad sgo nas

gzung bya yi/ /chos rnams dngos po 'di dag la/ /shes rab kyis ni 'di ltar brtag /blo yis rnam par dpyad pa na/ /'di dag don dam yod dam ci/ /gal te yin na 'di de nyid/ /gal te gzhan na de btsal bya/ /phyogs su lhung bas sems gdungs pas/ /zhi ba nam yang

rtogs mi 'gyur/ /'dus byas 'dus ma byas chos ni/ /phung po skye mched khams rnams so / /nyon mongs sgrib pa spang ba'i phyir/ /nyan thos rnams la rab tu bshad/ /nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib dri ma/ /spang phyir snying rje ldan rnams la/ /rag phyir dang po kho nar ni/ /gzugs kyi phung

po brtag par bya/ /de la'ang dang por 'byung ba rnams/ /ji skad bstan pa'i gtan tshigs kyis/ /'dir ni sa la sogs pa dag /don dam par na 'byung ba yi/ /ngo bo nyid min byas phyir dang / /rgyu ldan sogs phyir shes pa bzhin/ /sa ni sra ba'i ngo bo min / /'byung ba nyid phyir rlung bzhin

no/ /sa yis las ni 'dzin ma yin/ /byas pa nyid phyir chu bzhin no/ /med kyang gal te de nyid du/ /sa yi dngos nyid sra snyam na/ /rnal 'byor pa dag de la ni/ /'byung dang 'bying ba mi rigs so/ /bsam gtan pa yi bsam gtan mthus/ /sa ni gsher ba nyid mi rigs/ /ngo

bo nyid la 'gyur med phyir/ /yang na de sra nyid ma yin/ /de bzhin chu dang me rlung dag /gsher la sogs pa'i dngos nyid min/ /de dag las kyang sdud pa dang / /smin dang g.yo bar byed mi rigs/ /rlung la sogs pa kun rdzob tu/ /yon tan mnyam par mi 'dod min/ /lus

kyi dbang pos dmigs phyir dang / /'byung ba yin phyir sa bzhin no/ /sa la sogs pa rdzas yod min/ /tshogs pa'i yan lag min med phyir/ /gang dag ji skad bstan pa de/ /rdzas yod ma mthong nags tshal bzhin/ /sa la sogs pa yul gyi blo/ /

de yang rdzas yod ma yin 'dod/ /rgyu dang bcas phyir 'jig pa'i phyir/ /nags tshal la sogs blo bzhin no/ /sa la sogs pa ston pa'i sgra/ /brjod pa rdzas su mi 'dod de/ /mnyam pa yin phyir dmag la sogs/ /ston pa'i sgra dag mi 'dod bzhin/ /pal

sha pan d+ha la sogs pa/ /nags tshal rtsom pa yin mi 'dod/ /rgyu ldan la sogs gtan tshigs kyis/ /dper na rtsa ba la sogs bzhin/ /yan lag can gyi nags tshal ni/ /pa la sha la sogs brtsams min/ /de dag re rer ma rdzogs phyir/ /yal ga la sogs gang

yin bzhin/ /nags tshal sgra ni ma nges pa/ /du ma'i rdzas grangs 'jug ma yin/ /khyad par can gyi blos brtag phyir/ /bum bzangs la sogs sgra bzhin no/ /gang phyir gzugs ni don dam du/ /mig gi dbang po'i gzung ba min/ /bsags phyir dper na sgra bzhin dang / /

'byung las gyur phyir de nyid bzhin/ /gzugs ni mig gis bzung min te/ /'byung las gyur phyir rang gzugs bzhin/ /bde la sogs 'byung rgyu phyir dang / /brjod bya yin phyir ro sogs bzhin/ /de bzhin gzugs ni 'byung 'gyur min/ /'byung phyir me la sogs pa bzhin/ /rgyu ldan

la sogs gtan tshigs kyi / /yang na sems bzhin shes par bya/ /des ni kha dog dbyibs dang ni/ /bsags dang phra dang rags sogs kyi/ /dbye bas gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dag /ji snyed rnam par brtags pa rnams/ /ji ltar rigs pa'i sbyor ba yin / /bkag par khong du chud par

bya/ /sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg /dgag pa'i tshul yang de bzhin no/ /mig gi dbang po don dam du/ /gzugs la lta ba ma yin te/ /sems dang sems byung las gzhan phyir/ /dper na ri bo'i dbang po bzhin/ /yang na mig ni don dam du/ /gzugs la lta ba ma yin te/ /rnam

shes dngos med mi skye'i phyir/ /pags pa dag la sogs pa bzhin/ /mig ni gzugs kyi yul can min/ /rang gi gzugs la mi 'dzin phyir/ /nyan la sogs pa'i dbang po dang / /gzugs can yin phyir ro sogs bzhin/ /de bzhin lta po mig med pa/ /dpe yang med pas

mthong ma yin/ /blta ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pas/ /ji ltar gzugs la blta bar rigs/ /blta ba'i ngo bo nyid min pas/ /ji ltar gzugs la blta bar rigs/ / gal te lta po nyan po na/ /ci phyir de ni nyan por 'gyur/ /de shes nyid dang rtag mi 'dod/ /bsgyur rung khyad par yin

pa'i phyir/ /gcig nyid ma yin tshul gnyis phyir/ /lus gzhan dag gi gzugs bzhin no/ /de bzhin mig gi dbang po ni/ /gzugs la dmigs pa'i byed mi 'dod/ /yid bral nyid na lta po las/ /gzhan phyir nyan la sogs pa bzhin/ /de ni lta po nyid mi

rigs/ /mig la sogs la ltos pa'i phyir/ /yid bzhin yongs su 'gyur phyir dang / /de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'char phyir ro/ /lta po ji ltar yid dang 'dra/ /dbang po gzhan gyis mi mthong phyir/ /yid ni yang dag nyid du na/ /lta bar mi 'dod

bdag bzhin no/ /de ni lta min tshogs pa dag /rdzas su med phyir de nyid bzhin/ /byed po nyid rung chos gzhan dag /mngon par 'grub phyir dril bu bzhin/ /mig ni 'od zer ldan mi rigs/ /dbang po yin phyir dbang gzhan bzhin/ /mtshan mo rgyu ba'i mig 'bras

snang / /dbang po snang ba ma yin no/ /mig ni bde sogs bdag nyid min/ /dngos po yin phyir skyes bu bzhin/ /mig ni kun tu song min te/ /g.yo phyir de 'bras la sogs bzhin/ /yang na mig ni kun 'gro min/ /gzhan don nyid phyir bum pa bzhin/ /

gzugs dmigs 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin phyir/ /dper na gzugs bzhin de bzhin no/ /mig ni me dang ldan ma yin/ /dbang po yin phyir lpags sogs bzhin/ /'byung chen dang sogs bdag nyid ni / /me shas che ba ma yin no/ /mig ni yul dang phrad ma yin/ /

dbang po yin phyir yid bzhin dang / /rgyu phyir rgyu dang ldan pa'i phyir/ /yang na gzugs la sogs pa bzhin/ /sna sogs yul phrad 'dzin mi 'dod/ /phyi don mngon sum 'dzin phyir dang / /'das dang ma 'ongs mi 'dzin phyir/ /dper na mig gi dbang po bzhin/ /sgrub dang 'dra bar

bkag pa'i phyir/ /lus la sogs pa ma nges min/ /mig rna yid kyi mtshan nyid gsum/ /yul dang ma phrad 'dzin ma yin/ /lta ba ji ltar rgyas bshad pas/ /nyan dang snom dang myang ba dang / /lus kyi dbang po gsal ba dag /

nges par khong du chud par bya/ /sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg /dgag pa'i tshul yang de yin te/ /mkhas pas gzu bo'i blo dag gis/ /ci rigs par ni shes par bya/ /tshor ba don dam nyid du na/ /myang ba'i bdag nyid yin mi rigs/ /rnam shes mtshungs par

ldan pa'i phyir/ /de las gzhan pa'i sems byung bzhin/ /bde ba phan 'dogs mi 'dod de/ /reg las byung phyir de gzhan bzhin/ /sdug bsngal gnod pa'i bdag nyid min/ /gtan tshigs bstan pas shes par bya/ /sdug min bde min mi 'dod de/ /'bras bu sred phyir

gzhan bzhin no/ /rnam shes ngo bo nyid kyang ni/ /dgag pa smra bar 'dod phyir ro/ /'du shes 'du byed rnam gnyis dag /des ni rnam par bshad gyur te/ /mkhas pas gzu bo'i blo dag gis/ /ci rigs par ni shes par bya/ /rnam shes don dam nyid du na/ /dngos po rnam rig dngos

nyid min/ /dmigs dang bcas phyir 'du shes bzhin/ /yang na 'jig phyir mar me bzhin/ /phung po lnga po rnam dpyad pa'i/ /sgrub pa ji skad bstan pa des/ /phung po rnams kyi khams shes bya/ /skye mched rnams kyang shes par bya/ /skye sogs 'dus byas nyid kyis ni/ /

mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi nyid mi rigs/ /'dus byas yin phyir rtogs bya'i phyir/ /de las gzhan pa nyid bzhin no/ /dngos rnams mtshan nyid yod pa'i phyir/ /ngo bo nyid yod nyid mi 'dod/ /de phyir gtan tshigs don ma grub/ /don 'gal nyid du'ang gyur pa yin/ /sa yi

mtshan nyid sa nyid kyis/ /sra ba nyid du mtshon mi rigs/ /lus kyi rnam shes rgyu yin phyir/ /me nyid kyis ni mi rigs bzhin/ /glang gi mtshan nyid glang nyid kyis/ /nog dang lkog shal sogs mi 'dod/ /khyad par can gyi blos brtag phyir/ /dper na bong bu'i mtshan nyid

bzhin/ /gcig na ji ltar mtshan nyid yin/ /des ni de nyid mi mtshon phyir/ /gzhan na ji ltar mtshan nyid yin/ /gzhan gyis gzhan nyid mi mtshon phyir/ /ma song ba la don dam du/ /'gro ba yod par mi 'dod de/ /lam yin phyir dang 'gro med phyir/ /dper na ma 'ongs

lam bzhin no/ /'gom la don dam nyid du na/ /'gro ba yod pa ma yin te/ /song dang ma song ma gtogs par/ /'gom pa rtag tu med phyir ro/ /'gom pa song dang ma song bar/ /brjod pa min la'ang 'gro med de/ /lam yin phyir na 'das pa bzhin/ /yang na

ma 'ongs lam bzhin no/ /'gro ma grub phyir 'gro po med/ /de phyir de ni 'gro mi 'dod/ /'gro po min par 'gro mi rigs/ /'gro dang bral phyir sngon bzhin no/ /rang las gzhan pa'i don 'brel la/ /'gro po snyam pa'i blo 'di 'dod/ /blo dang sgra rjes 'jug pa'i phyir/ /dbyug

can bzhin min rjes 'gro med/ /rgyun chags yul gzhan 'byung ba yi / /'du byed rgyun la brten nas ni/ /me la sogs bzhin 'khrul pa'i 'gro/ /de yang kun rdzob de nyid min/ /ser skya pa yis rnam brtags pa'i/ /'gro po don dam nyid mi rigs/ /tshogs pa rdzas su med

phyir dang / /yang na g.yo ba med phyir ro/ /gal te tshogs pa rdzas yod de/ /tshogs byed ma bzung gzung med phyir/ /de yi bdag bzhin de mi rigs/ /de dag rdzas su med phyir ro/ /bya ba lhag ma dgag pa yang / /phyogs des rab tu bstan pa yin/ /gal te dngos nyid yod 'dod

de/ /'khor dang thar pa yod phyir na/ /gang tshe ji ltar rnam brtags pa / /de dag rang bzhin rnam dpyad na/ /nges gzung med pa de yi tshe/ /ji ltar bcings shing gang nas thar/ /ngo bo nyid yod ma yin pa/ /sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu dang / /rang gi rgyu dang rkyen dbang las/ /bdag

nyid khyad par 'thob la 'thad/ /ming dang gzugs ni don dam du/ /'khor bar rigs pa ma yin te/ /'dus byas yin phyir phyi rol gyi/ /sa la sogs pa mi 'dod bzhin/ /ming gzugs don dam nyid du na/ /ji ltar yang ni thar mi 'gyur/ /skye dang ldan phyir 'jig pa'i

phyir/ /phyi rol chu la sogs pa bzhin/ /gang zag yang dag nyid du ni/ /'khor dang thar par mi 'gyur te/ /gdags bya yin phyir khang pa bzhin/ /brjod bya yin phyir ri dang 'dra/ /yang na gang zag gang zag min/ /rgyu dang ldan phyir bum pa bzhin/ /

skye dang ldan phyir 'jig pa'i phyir/ /shes bya yin phyir 'ong ba bzhin/ /gang zag brjod du med phyir bas/ /rdzas su yod par mi 'gyur ste/ /dri dang dkar sngor brjod med pa'i/ /mo gsham bus ni ma nges 'gyur/ /de ltar phung po bdag med cing / /srog med sems can yod min pa/ /

mkhas pas gzu bo'i blo dag gis/ /ci rigs par ni shes par bya/ /lus dang dbang po'i tshogs rnams la/ /de nyid du na bdag med 'dod/ /rgyu dang ldan phyir ka ba bzhin/ /yang na bsags phyir grog mkhar bzhin/ /dran pa dang ni ngo shes dang / /shes skye la sogs gtan

tshigs kyi/ /bdag yod nyid du dam 'cha' ba/ /gtan tshigs rnams ni ma grub nyid/ /gal te dbang bcas lus la ni/ /bdag yod nyid du sgrub byed na/ /gtan tshigs thun mong nyid mi 'gyur/ /rjes su 'gro ba med phyir ro/ /gal te bdag sgra don bzhin te/ /'ga' la nye bar

gdags pa'i phyir/ /seng ge'i sgra dang 'dra zhe na/ /bdag ni grub pa nyid mi 'gyur/ /ci ste rnam shes yul la ni/ /don bzhin gzhan la sgrub byed na/ /rtag dang kun 'gro sogs bral phyir/ /'gal ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /de phyir gang la'ang don dam du/ /bcings dang thar

pa yod mi 'dod/ /song dang ma song 'gom pa yis/ /de bzhin sems la lhag ma bshad/ /gang tshe sems ni 'gag pa la/ /mngon du phyogs shing skyes pa'i tshe/ /gang la gang gis chags par 'dod/ /chags pa 'gags la'ang mi 'dod do/ /gal te skye bzhin chags zhe na/ /

de ci gal te skye mngon phyogs/ /ma skyes pa la de mi 'dod/ /gzhi med bya ba mi ldan phyir/ /skye bzhin skyes dang ma skyes par/ /brjod pa mig la'ang chags pa med/ /brjod med sems kyang chags min te/ /brjod du med phyir 'dod chags bzhin/ /gal te sems ni chags pa yi / /

rnam par shes pa chags 'dod de/ /shel la tshon chags blo bzhin na/ /de'i blo ji ltar chags nyid yin/ /de ltar chags pa med pa'i phyir/ /'dod chags rtog pa kun rdzob yin/ /'dod chags bzhin du chos rnams kun/ /ci rigs par ni shes par bya/ /dngos po rdzas la rten

rigs na/ /de yang de las dbyer yod min/ /de phyir 'dod chags ji bzhin du/ /sems la'ang chags pa 'thad mi 'gyur/ /'dod chags chags las gzhan mi rigs/ /chags pa ma bzung gzung med phyir/ /chags pa nyid bzhin tha dad na 'ang / /des ni mi chags gzhan bzhin no/ /

dngos po rnam par rig pa'i sems/ /'dod chags las gzhan yod min te/ /dmigs pa la sogs mtshungs phyir dang / /tha dad rgyu gzhan med phyir ro/ /de phyir 'dus pa gcig rang nyid/ /skyes la ltos nas 'dus pa can/ /tha dad bstan pa nyid 'dod de/ /me tog

rgyas pas shing bzhin no/ /de spangs phyir ni mya ngan 'das/ /mi rigs de nyid mi 'thad phyir/ /mya ngan 'das pa don dam du/ /dngos dang dngos med mtshan nyid min/ /gal te mya ngan 'das dngos na/ /dngos po yin phyir de 'dus byas/ /gnyen po ma yin 'dus byas phyir/ /dper na

'dus byas 'gags pa bzhin/ / gal te dngos med gzhan brten 'gyur/ /dngos po med phyir zhig pa bzhin/ /de ni gnyen por mi 'dod de/ /gzhan la brten phyir zhig bzhin no/ /de ni 'dus ma byas mi rigs/ /dgag pa gong du bstan pa'i phyir/ /grangs can dag gis rab brtags

pa'i /grol ba'i sems las khyad ci yod/ /nyon mongs rnam rtog gtsub shing las/ /byung ba rang gi ngang zad pa/ /de la bsags pa yod min pas/ /gang zag khyod thar mi zad 'gyur/ /skye ba med la rtog pa yang / /de bzhin med phyir tshul nyid mtshungs/ /zad pa can nam zad med

na/ /gang gi zad pas thar pa smros/ /rang bzhin stong nyid rtogs pa'i phyir/ /de yi blo yang zlog gyur pas/ /zad med mi zad chos nyid 'thob/ /thob pa med pa'i tshul gyis so/ /yang dag ji bzhin yongs rtog pa/ /bdag la phan pa 'dod pa dag /lta ngan nad dri ngan bsgos pa'i/ /

sgregs pa'i tshig la rten mi byed/ /phyin ci log dag yod pa'i phyir/ /'dod chags yod par mi rigs te/ /'dod chags bzhin du brtags pa'i phyir/ /rtog pa de yang kun rdzob pa / /sems dang sems las byung ba yi/ /ngo bo nyid phyir sngar bkag phyir/ /

gang gi de ni chags 'gyur ba'i/ /'dod chags chags pa'i dngos nyid med/ /des ni sdang dang rmongs la sogs/ /so sor bshad pa byas par 'gyur/ /de ltar bcings thar ma grub phyir/ /ngo bo nyid med g.yo ba med/ /sa ni don dam nyid du na/ /sa las gzhan min

nyid mi 'dod/ /rgyu dang ldan phyir rlung bzhin dang / /dngos po yin phyir shes pa bzhin/ /sa las don dam nyid du na/ /chu ni gzhan par mi bzung ste/ /skye dang ldan phyir rdzas las ni/ /sa gzhan min pa ji bzhin no/ /sa la sogs pa sgra blo dang / /las dang mtshan nyid tha dad

pas/ /de dag gzhan nyid mi 'dod de/ /bsgrub bya'i chos dang mi ldan phyir/ /gzugs kyi bdag nyid mi gzhan yang / /tha snyad yod phyir ma nges 'gyur/ /yongs su brtags pa ma grub phyir/ /de don ma grub nyid du 'gyur/ /sgra sogs bye brag tha dad kyang / /de phyir de dag 'khrul

par 'gyur/ /khyad par brjod par gyur kyang ni/ /'gal bas nges par zlog par 'gyur/ /gnyi ga nyid kyang mi rung ste/ /'gal phyir me la grang dro bzhin/ /gzhan dang gzhan min phyogs dgag pa/ /bstan phyir de yang bzang po min/ /gnyi ga'i bdag nyid nyid yin yang / /kun la

grags pa'i cha dper bstan/ /des na gzhan la dpe med pa/ /rab tu skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ni ltos nas 'grub pa ste/ /gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig /sngar ma grub na mi 'grub phyir/ /yid kyis rnam par brtags par zad/ /gnyi gar smra ba thams cad la/ /dgag pa'i

tshul yang de nyid do/ /de ltar 'di skad bsgrub bstan pas/ /ngo bo nyid yod nyid ma grub/ /de ltar 'dus byas chos de dag /bsdu bas rnam par brtags pa yin/ /'dus ma byas ni 'gog gnyis dang / /nam mkha' dang ni de bzhin nyid/ /so sor brtags te 'gog pa ni/ /

don dam du na dngos po min/ /rtag dang rang bzhin mi 'gyur phyir/ /mo gsham bu yi gzugs bzhin no/ /ma skyes phyir dang rgyu med phyir/ /de bzhin las kyang med phyir dang / /'dus byas ma bsdus phyir dang ni/ /'gag pa med pa'i phyir yang ngo / /gang gi 'bras bur

gang 'dod pa/ /de ni de'i rgyu ma yin te/ /ma skyes la sogs gtan tshigs kyis/ /glang chen glad kyi rwa bzhin no/ /ma skyes rgyu dang ldan pa yi/ /'bras bur mi 'dod shes par bya/ /'bras bu yin phyir sbrang rtsi ni/ /mkha' min sogs rgyu ldan min bzhin/ /des ni nam mkha'

de bzhin nyid/ /phyogs dang dus dang bdag la sogs/ /'dus ma byas pa ji snyed pa/ /bkag par mkhas pas shes par bya/ /rdzas dang gtso bo srog la sogs/ /mu stegs brtags pa'i shes bya dag /rigs dang lung la mkhas rnams kyis/ /ci rigs par ni dgag

par bya/ /rang dang gzhan gyis grub pa'i phyir/ /dngos po rnams la bdag btags pa/ /mkhas pas bdag med rtogs bya zhing / /de nyid shes pa'i bdud rtsi btung / /yang na rnam rtog dra ba yi/ /rgyun 'brel de dag la sogs pa/ /dngos po skye bar 'dzin brten pas/ /

nan gyis byis pa 'khrug par byed/ /gang tshe mkhas pa rig sgron gyis/ /yang dag ji bzhin yongs rtogs pa/ /de tshe skye bkag de zhi bas/ /spros pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur/ /de la re zhig bdag skye ba/ /kun rdzob tu yang mi rigs te/ /bdag nyid yod phyir dper bya na/ /

zho ni bdag las mi skye bzhin/ /dngos rnams bdag las ma skyes te/ /dngos po yin phyir skyes bu bzhin/ /ma skyes pa la bdag med de/ /ma skyes phyir na mkha' min bzhin/ /nam mkha'i me tog med pa'i don/ /mkha' la sogs par khyod 'dod pa/ /de dag nam mkha'i me

tog min/ /de phyir kho bo'i phyogs med min/ /gal te rgyu la 'bras bdag yod/ /de las de ni skye snyam zhing / /dngos rnams de las skye ba ni/ /bdag las skye ba nyid 'dod na/ /de la gzhan min bdag bzhin na/ /rgyu ni rgyu min nyid du 'gyur/ /ma skyes phyir ni rgyu min pa/ /ci zhig

yin zhing gang gi rgyu/ /'bras bu bdag nyid nyid yin na/ /rgyur brtags pa ni don med 'gyur/ /de nyid las ni de skye na/ /bskyed dang bskyed bya gcig tu 'gyur/ /gal te 'o ma zho nyid du/ /gnas pas gnod pa med snyam na/ /pha ni bu nyid mi 'gyur

bas/ /gnod pa med pa ma yin no/ /mi mthun phyogs ni med pa'i phyir/ /gtan tshigs 'gal ba nyid mi 'dod/ /de ltar re zhig dngos po rnams/ /bdag las skye bar mi rigs so/ /ngo bo nyid ni med pa'i phyir/ /gang zhig gang las gzhan du 'dod/ /glang ru dang ni ri rtse las/ /

rta ru gzhan du mi 'dod bzhin/ /mig la sogs pa rkyen gzhan rnams/ /don dam du na mig sogs kyi/ /rnam shes skyed par byed ma yin/ /gzhan phyir rtsi skyang la sogs bzhin/ /gzugs kyi blo la sogs pa dag /brjod 'dod mi sogs rgyu can min/ /gzhan phyir snga na

med pa'i phyir/ /dper na bum snam la sogs bzhin/ /ma skyes pa yi gzhan nyid ni/ /kun rdzob yin pas don dam min/ /gzhan las skye ba nyid kyang ni/ /rigs pa ma yin gzung bar bya/ /skyes pa brjod du med pa la/ /skye ba don med nyid du 'gyur/ /ma skyes pa la skye med

de/ /ma skyes phyir ni mkha' min bzhin/ /skye bzhin skye bar 'dod pa la/ /brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs par 'gyur/ /brjod du med la 'ang de med de/ /brjod du med phyir gzhan bzhin no/ /yang na mig la sogs pa dag /brtags pa'i bdag nyid nyid kyis stong / /byas pa'i phyir

dang 'jig pa'i phyir/ /dper na sgyu ma'i 'o ma bzhin/ /bsgrub dang mtshungs par bkag pa'i phyir/ /cig shos kyi ni the tshom med/ /sgyu ma'i bdag nyid ma brtags pa'ang / /yang dag tu na log par 'dod/ /la la'i 'dod chags rgyu yin phyir/ /dper na brtags pa

de nyid bzhin/ /grags pa'i chas ni de grub phyir/ /kho bo'i dpe ni med ma yin/ /yang na mig la sogs pa ni/ /yang dag tu na dngos nyid stong / /byas pa nyid phyir 'jig nyid phyir/ /bdud kyis sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin/ /dngos po rnams kyi dngos nyid gang / /yang

dag tu na dngos de med/ /byas phyir dper na chu yi ni/ /tsha ba nyid dang brtan nyid bzhin/ /dngos rnams rang gi bdag nyid du/ /skye bar 'thad pa ma yin pas/ /gzhan gyi dngos por mi skye ste/ /ba lang bong bur ma mthong bzhin/ /rgyu la sogs pa'i rkyen gzhan las/ /skye ba

kun rdzob tha snyad yin/ /de phyir khas blangs gnod pa med/ /de dag yang dag nyid ma yin/ /yod la rkyen rnams mi rigs te/ /med la'ang mi rigs yod med phyir/ /de las gzhan bzhin rkyen ma skyes/ /rkyen rnams su ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /rgyu ni 'bras bu bskyed

ma yin/ /de yis stong phyir de gzhan bzhin/ /skye bar 'dod pa'ang des bskyed min/ /snga na med phyir de gzhan bzhin/ /des ni skyes dang ma skyes dang / /skyes bzhin skyed pa mi byed de/ /nyes pa bstan phyir ma skyes pa'i/ /rgyu ni yang dag nyid ma yin/ /skyes pa dmigs

dang mi phrad de/ /skyes la'ang skye ba don med phyir/ /ma skyes pa yang ma skyes phyir/ /dper na mi skye chos bzhin no/ /skye bzhin phrad par 'gyur snyam na/ /de yang dmigs pa med par med/ /yan lag ma tshang ba la ni/ /skye ba'i bya ba 'jug mi 'dod/ /yang na sems dang

sems byung rnams/ /yang dag dmigs pa yod mi 'dod/ /skye bzhin phyir dang gzung ba'i phyir/ /dper na gzugs la sogs pa bzhin/ /yang na de dag dmigs bcas pa/ /dus gcig phyir na de mi rung / /de ltar dmigs pa yod min pas/ /gang zhig gang gis dmigs

par 'gyur/ /ma skyes pa la 'gag med de/ /ma skyes nyid phyir mkha' min bzhin/ /'gags pa la yang 'gag med de/ /'gags phyir dper na shi ba bzhin/ /ma 'gags pa la'ang ma 'gags phyir/ /da ltar 'jug pa'i mar me bzhin/ /'gag bzhin pa la mi

'dod de/ /dgag pa gong du bstan phyir ro/ /de yang dus mnyam nyid cig gam/ /yang na dus gzhan 'gyur grang na/ /mi rigs 'gag bzhin yin pa'i phyir/ /dgra bcom sems kyi tha ma bzhin/ /dngos po yod pa don dam du/ /mi rigs skye ba med pa'i phyir/ /mo

gsham bu yi yod pa bzhin/ /de phyir bdag po med par 'dod/ /'bras bus stong ngam mi stong pa'i / /rkyen zhig bdag por 'gyur grang na/ /stong pa ma yin des stong phyir/ /dper na mig ni sgra blo bzhin/ /sbyang la sogs na gnas pa yi/ /rgyu tsam yod

pa nyi tshe la/ /'bras bu 'bras bur mi 'gyur zhing / /med pa khyod la 'bras bur 'gyur/ /gal te 'bras bu'i nus 'bras na/ /de las gzhan pa'i rgyu ci yod/ /de las gzhan pa ma yin la/ /gzhi dang bzhag pa'i dngos mi 'dod/ /'bras bu'i ming tsam nyid la ni/ /

dper na mkha' la mkha' gnas bzhin/ /gal te de nyid rgyu yin na/ /gang gis mi gtong de cir yod/ /yod la skye ba med pa'i phyir/ /gang zhig gang gis bdag por 'dod/ /med las rkyen yang med pa'i phyir/ /gang zhig gang gis bdag por 'dod/ /gal te bum sogs

skyes mthong bas/ /mthong la gtan tshigs don med de/ /mngon sum dang ni grags pa yi/ /gnod pas gnod par 'gyur zhe na/ /bum pa la sogs skye ba dag /byis pa'i blo dang mthun mthong ba/ /gang phyir de ni mi 'gog pas/ /de phyir ji skad smras skyon med/ /gzugs

la dmigs pa'i blo la ni/ /yang dag tu na rang rig med/ /de ma skyes phyir kho bo la/ /de yi gnod pa med phyir ro/ /mngon sum blo ni don dam du/ /don bzhin nyid du mi rigs te/ /byis pa'i blo dang khyad med phyir/ /mgal me'i 'khor lo'i blo bzhin no/ /de yi spyod yul dngos

min te/ /'dus byas yin phyir bdag blo bzhin/ /gzugs la sogs pa rdzas min phyir/ /nged la mngon sum gnod pa med/ /mkhas pa'i tshul la spyod pa la/ /grags pa'i gnod pa yod ma yin/ /de nyid la ni ma rig pa'i/ /ling tog ldongs pa'i tshig skabs min/ /yod

la'ang skye bar mi 'dod de/ /yod pa ci phyir skye bar gyur / /yod pa rags par mi byed de/ /snga na med dang phyis 'byung phyir/ /mig rags pa nyid gang yin pa / /de ni rkyen gyis ma byas te/ /snga na med phyir rdza mkhan bzhin/ /shes bya min phyir za po bzhin/ /za po la sogs kun

rdzob tu/ /thun mong yin par 'dod pa'i phyir/ /de phyir nged la gang du yang / /dpe yi skyon du 'gyur ba med/ /gal te gsal ba skyon med na/ /gang gis ci gsal ji lta bu/ /gal te de dag 'di skad ces/ /dper na mar mes bum pa bzhin/ /yod la mngon gsal byed phyir ro/ /

kun rdzob tu yang mar mes ni/ /bum pa snang dang bcas pa dang / /de yi blo'am gnyen po dag /skye bar byed pa nyid yin no/ /mngon par mi gsal gsal mi byed/ /mi gsal phyir na mkha' min bzhin/ /rang tshul gyis kyang dper bya na/ /gtso bo za po bzhin du bstan/ /gal

te de yang mngon gsal na/ /za po kun 'gro ma yin zhing / /rgyu med ma yin shes yod min/ /mi gsal ba yang nyams par 'gyur/ /gal te gtso bo mngon gsal na/ /khyod kyi gtso bo bya ba dang / /dpag yod gsal bar thal 'gyur te/ /de ni de dag min par grags/ /

gang gis gsal byed gang dag 'dod/ /de dag de gsal byed mi 'dod/ /rgyu nyid la sogs gtan tshigs kyis/ /rgyu spun la sogs zho min bzhin/ /gal te rgyu spun la sogs la 'ang / /de nus yod phyir dper med na/ /de min rgyu spun la sogs dngos/ /de dag de

gsal byed min phyir/ /bdag dang gzhan las skye ba dang / /bdag nyid yod dang med mi 'dod/ /gnyi gar smra ba yod min te/ /rigs pas gong du brtags phyir ro/ /kun rdzob tu yang 'bras bu ni/ /rkyen rnams kyis ni gsal mi 'dod/ /de zhig bar du rjes sgrub phyir/ /

sa la sogs pas bum pa bzhin/ /mig ni kun rdzob nyid du yang / /glo bur skye bar mi 'dod de/ /spyi dang khyad par ldan pa'i phyir/ /de ni dper na bum pa bzhin/ /'bras bu yin phyir rim skye'i phyir/ /'jig pa'i phyir dang yongs 'gyur phyir/ /rgyu rkyen nges pa'i phyir dang ni/ /skye ba'i

phyir yang shes par bya/ /gal te 'jim gong tshe gzhan la/ /'gags pa mi skye zhig pa'i phyir/ /'bras bu yin phyir dper na ni/ /bum pa bzhin du 'dod ce na/ /ji ltar bum pa bum pa yi / /ngo bo nyid 'gags mi skye ba/ /de ltar 'jim gong 'dod na ni/ /'dod pa nyid ni sgrub pa

yin/ /'on te 'gags pa rgyun min na/ /des na gtan tshigs 'gal ba nyid/ /gal te rgyun nyid ma nyams na/ /des na 'khrul pa nyid du 'gyur/ /mngal nas sngon rol blo la ni/ /mdun rol kho nar 'gags blo yod/ /shes bya gzhan gyis de

gzhan phyir/ /yang na blo phyir de 'og bzhin/ /tse'i tra la ni sgra blo dang / /gzugs blo skye ba gang yin pa/ /de gnyis mi gcig yul gzhan phyir/ /dper na rgyud gzhan dag gi bzhin/ /de phyir pha rol phyir yang ni/ /dpe med par ni mi 'gyur te/ /blo phyir de yang gcig nyid min/ /

gzhan blos 'khrul par 'gyur phyir ro/ /gal te med smra byis pa yis/ /'chi 'pho'i sems la mtshams sbyor med/ /'chi 'pho'i sems phyir dgra bcom gyi/ /tha ma'i sems bzhin sgrub byed na/ /gtan tshigs ma nges nyid 'gyur te/ /'das pa'i 'chi 'pho'i sems

kyis so/ /tshe rabs dran la sogs yod dang / /tshul smras phyir na de yang yod/ /'phags pa min pa'i 'chi 'pho'i sems/ /sems gzhan bskyed pa nyid yin te/ /ma rig pa dang bcas pa'i phyir/ /sems de skyed par byed pa bzhin/ /gal te lus dang dbang blo

dag /rang gi las kyis skyed mi 'dod/ /zhig phyir dper na bum pa bzhin/ /de phyir 'jig rten pha rol med/ /de nyid kyis ni de ma byas/ /de gzhan gyis kyang ma byas phyir/ /'jig rten rang gi las bskyed min/ /gzhan 'di nged la ci zhig gnod/ /las kyis skyed nyid

ma yin la/ /dpe ni yod pa ma yin no/ /shing la sogs pa dus skye ba/ /sems can las kyi dbang gis te/ /sems dmyal gnas dang mtho ris na/ /mtshon dang dpag bsam shing skye bzhin/ /'byung ba rnams la blo gros ni/ /mtshan nyid mi mthun ji ltar 'byung / /'byung

ba sems med rnams las ni/ /shes pa yod pa nyid skye ste/ /skye can yin phyir myos mthu dang / /me shel las ni me bzhin no/ /myos mthu shes yod ma yin pas/ /khyod kyi dpe ni med pa nyid/ /rgyu rnams rigs mthun yin pa'i phyir/ /gtan tshigs kyang ni 'gal ba nyid/ /nang

gi 'byung ba rnams kyang ni/ /shes pa yod pa ma yin te/ /sa la sogs pa'i dngos phyir dang / /'byung ba yin phyir de gzhan bzhin/ /de phyir mngal nas sngon rol sems/ /sems gzhan sngon du song yin par/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis shes bya ste/ /'dzin pa yin phyir

de 'og bzhin/ /be'u yang sngon chad goms byas pas/ /byung ma thag tu zas tshol byed/ /zas kyi don du skyod pa'i phyir/ /dper na dbang po smin pa bzhin/ /khab long gis ni rdo bskyod pas/ /gtan tshigs ma nges nyid ma yin/ /de ni zas za mthong ba'i phyir/ /ma

grub nyid kyang ma yin no/ /dbang phyug 'jig rten byed po min/ /la la'i dga' ba'i rgyu yin phyir/ /dper na dbang phyug dga' byed pa'i/ /byed po dbang phyug ma yin bzhin/ /dbang phyug kun gyi rgyur mi 'dod/ /ma skyes phyir dang rgyu med phyir/ /dper na nam mkha'i

me tog ni/ /kun gyi rgyur ni mi 'dod bzhin/ /'gro ba ma lus 'di dag gi /rgyu ni dbang phyug rab tu min/ /sems dang ldan phyir dper na ni/ /glang rdzi 'gro rgyu rab min bzhin/ /dbang phyug gcig pu 'ga' yang med/ /dngos rnams tshogs las 'grub pa'i phyir/ /byed po gcig

pu 'ga' yang med/ /de phyir ma nges nyid ma yin/ /gal te mig sogs dbang phyug bcas/ /mang phyir bran bzhin 'dod ce na/ /ma skyes dbang phyug gcig mi 'grub/ /dbang phyug de las zlog par 'gyur/ /ci ste byed por bcas 'dod de/ /bkod phyir bum sogs bzhin

zhe na/ /gal te khyad par ma bstan pa'i/ /byed po yin na grub pa sgrub/ /ci ste rtag cig phra sogs kyi/ /khyad par gyis ni khyod dpe med/ /khyod kyi de ni mi rtag dang / /gzugs can skyes nyid skyon du 'gyur/ /gal te sems can snod bgrang ba'i/ /'jig rten sna tshogs rgyu yi las/ /

dbang phyug yin na kun rdzob tu'ang / /grub pa nyid la rab tu sgrub/ /des ni dus dang skyes bu dang / /gtso bo rdul phran khyab 'jug dag /'gro ba 'di yi rgyu min par/ /dgag pa khong du chud par bya/ /gal te lta ba'i mun sel ba/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas 'byung de'i phyir/ /de bzhin skye

mched skye 'dod na/ /lan du rung ba ma yin no/ /dus med skye ba yod min na/ /gang la lta ba gang zhig 'dod/ /de yod ma yin rtogs bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba byed po nyid/ /gal te lha dang lha min gcig /des na ji ltar rtag mi 'gyur/ /

gal te lha dang lha min gzhan/ /ji ltar chad par mi rigs 'gyur/ /brjod min bum pa bzhin na yang / /chad pa ji ltar spong bar 'gyur/ /yin dang ma yin nyid yin yang / /mya ngan 'das tshe gcig 'da' med/ /gal te 'gags pa skye gyur na/ /des na ji ltar rtag ma yin/ /

'gags pa skye ba med gyur na/ /ji ltar chad smra nyid ma yin/ /rgyun ni rdzas su med pa'i phyir/ /rtag chad de dag ga la yod/ /de med phyir na ma skyes la/ /rtag med chad med rigs pa yin/ /gal te sdug bsngal mi bskyed phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni chos ston pa/ /de

phyir de yi 'bras yod phyir/ /skye ba yod par 'dod ce na/ /gal te de ni skye 'dod na/ /de ni sngar bzhin skye med phyir/ /skye ba med pa de 'bras min/ /de yongs shes pa de'i 'bras yin/ /de ni bdag gis byas mi rigs/ /de nyid kyis de ma byas phyir/ /gzhan gyis

byas par mi 'dod de/ /gzhan gyis gzhan byed 'gal ba'i phyir/ /sdug bsngal rang rgyud skye mi 'dod/ /sems can la sogs med phyir dang / /rdzas med phyir dang dbyer med phyir/ /sdug bsngal de la rgyud kyang med/ /gal te mig sogs 'du byed rnams/ /de nyid

du na skye can te/ /sems can ming du brjod pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas nyid du sgrub byed na/ /nged la sangs rgyas skye chos min/ /de phyir de yod ma yin la/ /de bzhin de skye yod min te/ /bdag bzhin sgyu ma bzhin 'byung yod/ /gzugs ni yang dag nyid du na/ /sangs rgyas

ma yin rtogs bya'i phyir/ /'khor los sgyur bzhin rnam shes min/ /rang gzhan snang phyir mig 'phrul bzhin/ /phung po gzugs can sangs rgyas min/ /phung po bsdus pa yin 'dod phyir/ /skye 'jig chos can yin phyir dang / /shes bya yin phyir gzugs bzhin no/ /sku

ni sangs rgyas yin mi rigs/ /de zhig 'jig pa'i skyon phyir dang / /gzhan gyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir/ /bdag bzhin de ni ga la yod/ /brjod min rdzas med min 'dod de/ /snga ma bzhin du gsal ba'i phyir/ /bum pa bzhin du brjod min na/ /de ni ji ltar sangs

rgyas 'dod/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung mthong bas/ /chos dang sangs rgyas mthong ba'i phyir/ /skye mched skye yod mi 'dod de/ /snga ma bzhin du bsal phyir ro/ /bdag dang gzhan gnyis rgyu med min/ /yod med rtag dang mi rtag min/ /gzhan dang gzhan min skye med

pas/ /rtag dang chad pa rnam par spangs/ /skye ba yod min med ma yin/ /yod med ma yin de gang na/ /de mthong ston pa mthong 'gyur bas/ /ji lta bur ni shes par bya/ /de phyir ngo bo nyid smra'i tshig /'dod pa rnam par nyams pa yin/ /gang la skye ba sgyu ma yi / /skye

ba yod pa de la rung / /smras pa'i nyes pa'i dri bsal bas / /dam chos sgron ma rab bstan phyir/ /mdzad pas phan thogs tshul gyis ni/ /kun rdzob tu ni sangs rgyas mthong / /de ni de nyid mthong min te/ /sgyu 'dra yang dag ma yin phyir/ /rab tu brtag min rnam shes

min/ /brtag bya ma yin dpe med pa/ /mtshan ma med cing snang ba med/ /rnam rtog med cing yi ge med/ /lta ba'i blo yis rtogs bya ba/ /mthong ba med pas de mthong yin/ /de ni don dam nyid du na/ /bdag las ma yin gzhan las min/ /gnyis las ma yin rgyu med

min/ /yod med ma yin gzhan ma yin/ /sred med dbang phyug skyes bu dang / /gtso bo rdul phran la sogs pa'i/ /rgyu las skyes dang gsal bya yi/ /dngos po 'ga' yang yod ma yin/ /de la ngo bo nyid dang las/ /mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid brten pa dang / /gcig

nyid gzhan nyid kun nyon mongs/ /rnam par byung bar bya brten pa/ /dper na mkha' la lcag 'debs dang / /tshon gyi ri mo'i las dang ni/ /sa bon dag ni skye med ltar/ /rtog pa thams cad skye ba med/ /rab rib bral bar gyur pa'i mig /rnam dag dri ma med pa la/ /skra dang

sbrang bu zla gnyis dang / /rma bya'i mdongs dag mi snang ltar/ /mkhas pa nyon mongs shes bya yi/ /sgrib mun rab rib bral gyur cing / /yang dag mkhyen spyan dri med la'ang / /de bzhin ci yang snang ba med/ /dper na gnyid log gnyid dbang gis/ /

bu dang bud med gzhal med khang / /gnas la sogs pa mthong gyur pa/ /sad na de la mi mthong ltar/ /de bzhin kun rdzob shes pa dag /blo gros mig ni bye gyur cing / /mi shes gnyid dang bral gyur nas/ /sad pa'i tshe na mi mthong ngo / /dper na mtshan mo mun khrod na/ /

'byung po yang dag mi mthong ba/ /nyi ma shar cing mig bye'i tshe/ /snang bar gyur pa ma yin ltar/ /de bzhin mkhas pa yang dag gi /shes pa'i nyi mas mi shes pa'i/ /bag chags ma lus bcom pa'i tshe/ /sems dang sems byung yul mi mthong / /dngos rnams ngo bo nyid yod

par/ /mi mthong dngos nyid ma grub phyir/ /yang na dngos nyid skye med phyir/ /sgyu ma'i glang chen ji bzhin no/ /dngos rnams ngo bo nyid yod par/ /mi mthong kun rdzob skye yod phyir/ /yang na rgyu dang ldan pa'i phyir/ /sgyu ma'i glang chen ji bzhin no/ /dngos rnams med ces bya

ba'i blo/ /don bzhin yin par mi 'dod de/ /rtog pa'i sgo nas grub pa'i phyir/ /mtho yor la ni mi blo bzhin/ /yang na yang dag ma yin blos/ /dmigs bya'i dngos bdag log par 'dod/ /rtog pa'i shes pa'i yul yin phyir/ /smig rgyu la ni chu blo bzhin/ /yod

med blos ni rtogs bya ba/ /bkag phyir de bzhin mkhas rnams kyis / /rnam par mi rtog blo gros ni/ /skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis skye/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa'i phyir/ /de ni gtong ba'i sgo nas kyang / /mi rtog blo gros mi 'dod min/ /de ni sngar bzhin bgag phyir

ro/ /gang phyir stong nyid stong sogs kyi/ /ngo bo nyid kyis stong de'i phyir/ /mkhas pa stong pa nyid la yang / /stong pa nyid du lta mi 'gyur/ /dngos po'i bdag nyid snang med pa/ /mi rtog blo yi spyod yul yang / /don bzhin ma yin dmigs bya'i phyir/ /chu zla la ni zla blo bzhin/ /

rnam par mi rtog don yul gyi/ /blo rnams rtog pa med pa'ang brdzun / /bdag med la sogs ngo bo'i phyir/ /dper na rnam rtog bcas blo bzhin/ /shes bya rnam kun ma grub phyir/ /gang la rnam par mi rtog pa'i/ /blo yang skye bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de nyid mnyam med de mkhyen

gsung / /de rtogs phyir na gang zhig la/ /blo skye med pas sangs rgyas dngos/ /rnam rtog gnyid ni sangs phyir dang / /rtog pa med pas rgyas phyir ro/ /yongs shes byas sogs mthar thug dang / /mnyam nyid rtogs par gyur pa dang / /sprul pa dag gis skal ldan gyi/ /

blo yi pad ma kha 'byed phyir/ /chos rnams mtshan nyid tha dad pa/ /skyed dang dgag pa ma mdzad par/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi mnyam nyid dang / /bdag gzhan bdag nyid mnyam pa nyid/ /dmigs med nyid du rdzogs rgyas shing / /rdzogs sangs rgyas med sangs rgyas pas/ /

lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ /de ni rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes brjod/ /chos rnams gsal dang gzhag med phyir/ /chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin du/ /gang phyir de ni gshegs gyur pa/ /de phyir de ni de bzhin gshegs/ /rtogs bya gtan dang ma lus dang / /mthar

lhung rnam par spangs pa dag /rtogs med tshul gyis rtogs pa yis / /bder gshegs phyir na bde bar gshegs/ /gzhal med gzhal yas rtogs pa'i phyir/ /grangs med gzung du med pa'i phyir/ /bsam yas sems yul ma yin phyir/ /bstan min bstan du med pa'i

phyir/ /brtag med de ni 'di'o zhes/ /rnam kun brtag tu med pa'i phyir/ /gsal min gsal byed med pa'i phyir/ /zhi ba gnod pa med pa'i phyir/ /brtag par brjod de snang med pa'i/ /bdag nyid nyid kyis rnam kun tu/ /rnam rtog med pas rtag phyir dang / /rtag tu don ni

rab bsgrub phyir/ /zhi ba ngo bo nyid stong phyir/ /mtshan ma med pa dngos med phyir/ /mtshan ma nyid du mi 'gro dang / /mtshan ma med phyir de yang yin/ /mtshan ma med phyir snang ba med/ /snang med phyir yang mtshan ma med/ /mtshan ma med cing snang med pa/ /lta 'dod bdag

nyid grol bas mthong / /mi gnas mtshan ma med pa'i phyir/ /rnam par mi rtog mi gnas phyir/ /spros med rnam par mi rtog phyir/ /dmigs med der 'dzin med pa'i phyir/ /skye ba med pa rnam pa med/ /'gyur ba med pa 'od gsal ba/ /mnyam

pa mi mnyam mu med pa/ /rnam par mi rtog mtshan nyid med/ /mkha' bzhin de la lta med par/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag lta/ /gang dag rnam par mi rtog pa'i/ /gnas pas lhun grub dri med mig /'dud par byed dang yid byed dang / /brjod la sogs pa gsal ba dag /

mgon po la ni phyag 'tshal ba/ /de dag la ni gus phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas la sogs sgro btags pas/ /sgrub dang rjes su mthun par bstan/ /de nyid du na rnam kun du/ /rnam brtag min phyir brjod mi 'dod/ /'di la tshig dang ldog 'gyur zhing / /'di ni sems

kyi spyod yul min/ /'di la kun rtog ldog 'gyur zhing / /shes pa 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /grangs med bsod nams tshogs ldan zhing / /shes bya mtha' yas mkhyen gyur pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos sku 'di/ /spros pa nyer zhi zhi ba yin/ /sha yi mig

gis de lta min/ /lha yi mig gis blta ma yin/ /rtog bcas rnam rtog med pa yi/ /shes pas kyang ni mthong bar dka'/ /mtho ris sdig can yul min dang / /nyon mongs med pa de bcas min/ /nyi ma dmus long yul min ltar/ /de yang rtog ge'i spyod yul min/ /

yod min med min yod med min/ /de las gzhan min gzhan ma yin/ /phra ba ma yin chen po min/ /gcig min ring min nye ba'ang min/ /de las cung zad ji ltar yang / /skye ba med cing gsal ba med/ /'di la 'ga' yang gnas pa med/ /'ga' yang bag la zhar mi 'gyur/ /

tshangs la sogs pas gang mi rtogs/ /de ni tshangs pa dam pa yin/ /de ni bden pa dam pa zhes/ /thub pa bden pa gsung bas gsungs/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang dang / /'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa/ /mkhas pa thub pa mang po dag /bsnyen med tshul

gyis de bsnyen byed/ /de las dngos nyid mi gzhan dang / /des ni thugs su chud pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'dod de/ /gzhan gyis ma yin de ma rtogs/ /de nyid bsgoms pa goms byed pa/ /dmigs med gnas pa de la yang / /gang la yid ni chags

'gyur zhing / /sdang 'gyur rmongs 'gyur ga la yod/ /sdug bral mi sdug phrad pa las/ /byung ba'i sdug bsngal ga las 'byung / /'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te/ /pad+ma la ni chus bzhin no/ /'khor ba las ni byung ma yin/ /'khor ba las gnod bral ba yin/ /mya ngan

'das pa thob ma yin/ /mya ngan 'das la gnas dang 'dra/ /nyon mongs me yis gdung ba med/ /nyon mongs ldan yang nam mkha' bzhin/ /sems med sems med ma yin te/ /snyoms par 'jug la gnas phyir ro/ /de ni shes rab lhun po'i rtser/ /'dzegs shing mya ngan

med gyur kyang / /snying rje'i dbang gis 'jig rten pa/ /mya ngan gdungs dang sdug bsngal blta/ /de ni de tshe snying rje yis/ /brlan pa'i mig gis 'jig rten pa/ /rnam rtog bzo las byung ba yi / /rtog pa'i dra bas dkris pa dang / /skye rga na 'chi'i zug rngu yis/ /rma btod

na bar gyur pa dang / /zhan dang bkren dang mtha' ngan dang / /mgon med dpung gnyen med pa dang / /sdug bsngal nye bar zhi 'dod pas/ /sdug bsngal chu bo cher lhung dang / /sdug bsngal rgyu dag spel ba'i phyir/ /rmongs pa'i yid kyis zhugs pa dang / /de nyid bdud

rtsi zhi ba dang / /spros pa nyer zhi ston ka yi/ /dri med mkha' la blos dpyod pa'i/ /snang med mig med kun bltas nas/ /snying rjes shin tu yid gdungs pa/ /de la phan phyir brtul zhugs can/ /rdo rje rin chen sra ba'i sems/ /sems can gtso bo legs bslabs pa/ /

sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab brtson/ /dus gzhan dang ni mthu bzhin du/ /shes rab dran pa sngon 'gro bas/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /sbyin la sogs pa'i ri bo las/ /byung ba'i chu klung bsod nams dang / /dri

med dge ba'i chu ldan 'bebs/ /slong ba kun la dus kun du/ /phyi nang dngos po thams cad kyis/ /dbul dang slong ba'i sdug bsngal kun/ /rnam pa kun du sel bar byed/ /slong ba rnams kyi bsam pa dag /skad cig skad cig dgas

rdzogs shing / /dus kun mi zad 'bras bu yis / /'byor cing dpag bsam shing ltar byed/ /de ni gzhan phan bde skyid pa'i/ /bde 'gro kho nar skye bar 'gyur/ /yang na 'dod pas gzhan dag tu/ /gzhan phan bde ba skyed par skye/ /'gro ba de dang de dag tu/ /'khor

bcugs rtag bzod mtha' yas dang / /rgya mtsho bzhin du sgo kun nas/ /bsod nams chu bos yongs rgyas 'gyur/ /sems gnyen rnam par mi g.yeng dang / /shes bya rtogs dang mkhas pa'i blo/ /lhan cig skyes dang ldan gyur cing / /ji srid 'dod pa'i skal bar

gnas/ /grangs med dpag tu med pa yi/ /ting 'dzin nges rtog blo dang ldan/ /'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas dag /rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan par byed/ /bzo dang las sngon 'du byed dang / /las kyi rnam smin rab tu ston/ /'gro la phan pa bsgrub 'dod pas/ /

ji ltar 'dod pa rab tu skye/ /sangs rgyas skus ni gang ba yi/ /'jig rten khams rnams ston par byed/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus dang ni/ /zhing du rdzogs par byang chub ston/ /ye shes mig gis shes bya ba'i/ /de nyid thams cad ston par byed/ /chos

rnams bzhag pa nyid rtogs shing / /ming la sogs pa thob pa nyid/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa yis/ /mtha' yas zhing dag g.yo bar byed/ /dus gcig gam ni rim yang rung / /lus las 'bar dang 'bebs par byed/ /phyogs ni mtha' yas kun tu

yang / /rang gi 'od kyis spro bar byed/ /tshad med rmad byung bsam mi khyab/ /yon tan rin chen 'od 'bar ba/ /'jig rten rtsa lag sangs rgyas rnams/ /'khor dang bcas pa'ang ston par byed/ /gser dang nor bu bai DUr+ya/ /mu tig rdo rje mthon ka cher/ /ri bo'i dbang

po che rnams dang / /me nyid grang bar bzhed par byed/ /chen por gyur pa'i lus kyis su/ /rdo rje sogs la mi chags par/ /ngo mtshar byed cing skad cig gis/ /phyogs kun du ni 'gro zhing 'ong / /rang gi lus sam rdul phran la/ /dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten khams/ /

yang dag 'dzud kyang sems can la/ /gnod pa med pa'ang ston par byed/ /'jig rten khams rnams phra rab tu/ /phra rab de yi tshad nyid du/ /bsdus pa'am ni rgyas par yang / /bzhed pa tsam byed 'og stengs kyang / /de'i tshad 'od dang kha dog dang / /dbyangs dang

spyod lam phun tshogs kyis/ /gdul bya 'dul bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ /tshangs pa la sogs 'khor du 'gro/ /snang bar 'gyur zhing mi snang 'gyur/ /de dag 'gas kyang mi shes dang / /gzhan gyis zil gyis gnon par yang / /byed de snying rjes bskul ba'i phyir/ /'gro

ba'i gnas ni brjod rnams su/ /'gro ba dbang byas dgod 'dod pas/ /spobs sogs kyis ni dman pa la/ /spobs pa'i bde ba rab tu ster/ /dmyal sogs sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa / /'od zer btang ba la sogs kyis/ /zhi bar byed cing lha dbang sogs/ /

skal ba mnyam par 'gro bar byed/ /gdul bya ji bzhin sprul pa yi/ /sprul pa yis ni phyogs bkang nas/ /bstan pa rin chen char phab pas/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i bde ba bskyed/ /dus gsum tshad med lus nyid dang / /sangs rgyas zhing ni phun sum tshogs/ /'jig

rten khams ni dpag med rnams/ /'jig pa dang ni chags pa yang / /rang lus bde bar gshegs zhing du/ /de yang rang lus bdag nyid du/ /rang gi zhing ni bde gshegs skur/ /bzhed pa tsam gyis byin gyis rlob / /ba spu'i khung dang 'od zer las/ /nam mkha'

la ni rol mo'i sgra/ /sprul pa yis ni rab bton nas/ /thos na dga' bar 'gyur bas ni/ /mthar thug par ni gsal bar 'gengs/ /ka la ping+ka'i sgra dbyangs ni/ /zab cing rgya chen sgrogs pa yis/ /'jig rten rnams ni gsung gis 'gengs/ /mos pa'i dbang dang dbang

po bzhin/ /zhi bar ro gcig zhi ba dang / /gdul bya rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir/ /chos 'di rnams ni gsung bar mdzad/ /dman dang bag la nyal bcas dag /bde dang sdug bsngal sogs dang bcas/ /dman dang 'bring dang mchog rnams

dang / /yang dag gyi nom sogs de rnams/ /gang la ji ltar ji srid du/ /lus can rnams kyi sems 'byung ba/ /de rnams de la de bzhin dang / /de snyed mang rnams rig par byed/ /lha dang sprul pa phra mo dang / /de las bzlog par gyur pa dag /kun tu gzugs ni

thams cad kyang / /lha yi mig gis de dag mthong / /lha dang 'phags pa bkod dang sprul/ /gsal po'i sgra dang mir bcas dang / /ring na gnas dang bzlog pa dag /lha yi rna ba 'di yis thos/ /sngon gyi gnas rnams thams cad de/ /sems can rnams dang bdag nyid kyi/ /

ming dang rigs kyi bye brag rnams/ /dran zhing gzhan dag gi yang dran/ /tha dad 'gro ba'i 'dod pa dang / /mi 'dod las 'bras sna tshogs gnas/ /'chi dang 'pho dang skye ba rnams/ /lus can kun gyi rig par gyur/ /'jig rten khams ni dpag med du/ /'di yis gdul bya 'dul ba'i

phyir/ /dga' ldan gnas 'phos 'jug pa dang / /yang dag byang chub mngon par ston/ /rang gi 'dod pas dpag med pa'i/ /'jig rten khams kyi rdul mnyam pa/ /sangs rgyas zhing yang de snyed du/ /sems can rnams kyang de snyed kyi/ /gdul bya thabs kyis sprul

pa ni/ /rang gi zhing nas ma g.yos par/ /rang gi 'dod pas lus sprul pa/ /re re las kyang de snyed lag /de snyed pa yi mgo las lce/ /so so kun nas de snyed spro/ /lag pa de dag gis bzung ba'i/ /me tog dris bkang sna tshogs pa/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ /lhun

po'i tshad tsam dri spro zhing / /rgyas pa mchog bzang dri dag dang / /rdzogs sangs rnam par sangs rgyas dag /'gro la phan pa byed pa'i mchog /shin tu gus pas mchod par byed/ /lan cig min par bstod pas bstod/ /rin chen gdugs dang bla re sogs/ /mu tig dra bas

yongs brgyan pa/ /tshad med rin chen myu gu las/ /mche ba lta bu'i 'od zer 'phro/ /steng g.yogs ka ba 'bar bas dga'/ /mu tig phreng ba 'phyang ba dang / /rin chen sna tshogs du ma las/ /sna tshogs las kyis bzo sbyar ba/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / /

'od zer sgron ma brgya snyed 'bar/ /shin tu mtho ba mkha' mnyam pa/ /rin chen 'od kyis phyogs khyab byed/ /de yis rnam grangs du ma yis / /bstan pa rtag tu mkhas pa des/ /thos nas gus pa gzhan dag la/ /lhag chad med pa'i yi ges ston/ /mkhas pa legs

par bslabs pa des/ /bskal pa grangs med dpag med par/ /bsod nams ye shes stobs kyis 'phags/ /pha rol phyin rnams pha rol phyin/ /'di ni 'di ltar skyes bu mchog /rdzogs sangs nyi mar gyur nas ni/ /gdul bya'i sems can pad+ma'i mtsho/ /

bstan pa'i 'od kyis rgyas par byed/ /dri ma med pas dri ma sbyong / /gangs phreng bsil ba'i 'od zer dang / /tsan+dan pas lhag bsung gi chus/ /lus can yid kyi nyon mongs mes/ /rab tu gdungs pa zhi bar byed/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba dba' klong can/ /'chi ba'i chu srin bcas

mtsho las/ /theg pa gsum gyi gru chen gyis/ /'di yis skye bo myur du sgrol/ /bdag gis legs bshad chu rgyun gyis/ /thog ma med dus 'gro ba rnams/ /shin tu skom pa sel bar byed/ /yon tan gyis phongs kyang sel byed/ /srid pa'i dgon par lam stor bas/ /

ma rig pas bsgribs lam ston byed/ /'gro rnams shes rab mig phye nas/ /mya ngan 'das par phyin par byed/ /nyon mongs sbrul gdug mche bas btab/ /rang la phan pa'i thabs la brgyal/ /ye shes sman ni yang dag pa/ /rig pa bstan pas 'gro rnams gso/ /srid

par mgon med srog chags rnams/ /yun rings gnyid kyis log pa la/ /bstan pa rnga yi sgra dag gis/ /snying rje yid ni sad par byed/ /yun ring 'khor ba'i btson ra na/ /srid pa'i lcags sgrog gis bsdams pa/ /bdud bzhi las ni rgyal byas nas/ /bcings pa las ni

grol bar byed/ /byin za ngoms pa med pa bzhin/ /lha dang mi yi yul dag gis/ /shes rab bdud rtsi'i ro bzang pos/ /lus can rnams ni tshim par byed/ /'khor du stong nyid seng ge yi/ /sgra chen sgra ni bsgrags pa yis/ /gdul dka'

mu stegs myos pa ni/ /shes pas myos pa'i nga rgyal sel/ /dbang po chen po'i gzhu 'dra ba/ /'dom gang 'od kyis kun tu bskor/ /gzugs nas 'bar ba yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyi dpal/ /dpal nyid rgyan du gyur pa yi/ /yid dang

mig ni 'phrog byed pa'i/ /gzugs ni mnyam pa'i gzugs med pa/ /mdzes pa thams cad zil gyis gnon/ /de yis rnam pa drug cu dang / /ldan pa'i gsung gi cho 'phrul dang / /bcas pas lha dang lha min mi/ /la sogs yid ni dga' bar byed/ /de yi gsung dang

sku rnams kyis/ /yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam ltar/ /gdul ba'i dbang gis phyogs kun tu/ /sna tshogs bdag po'i gzugs su bsgyur/ /de dag de ltar sogs grangs med/ /dpag med rmad du byung ba'i gnas/ /che ba'i bdag nyid mkhas pas lam/ /'di

la brten nas thob par 'gyur/ /dbu ma'i snying po las de kho na nyid kyi shes pa tshol ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //rtogs par dka' ba'i lugs 'di la/ /rtogs pa'i nus pa chung gyur pa/ /gnas min skrag pa'i dman mos dag /yang dang yang du rtsod par

rtsom / /ston pa'i rnam par mi rtog blo/ /sku la brten pa ma yin te/ /lus can yin phyir ba rdzi yi/ /lus la ji lta ba bzhin zer/ /yang dag lta sogs lam gyis ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub cher/ /'dren byed yang dag rab rtogs byed/ /byang chub yin

phyir slob ma'i bzhin/ /ston pa'i dbang po khyad 'phags pas/ /kun mkhyen ye shes srid pa yin/ /lam gcig na yang 'dod pa bzhin/ /'ga' yi so so yang dag rig /shes bya'i sgrib pa zad byed pa/ /de yang lam de nyid kyis yin/ /sems las byung ba'i sgrib yin

phyir/ /nyon mongs sgrib pa ji bzhin 'dod/ /theg chen du yang lam 'di yis/ /kun rig thub pa 'thob byed de/ /theg pa gzhan nyid yin pa'i phyir/ /rang rgyal theg pa bzhin du 'dod/ /mdo sde sogs su ma bsdus dang / /lam gzhan nye bar ston phyir yang / /theg

chen sangs rgyas gsung ma yin/ /rig byed mtha' pa'i lta ba bzhin/ /chad par lta ba ji bzhin du/ /rgyu dang 'bras bur skur 'debs pas/ /sde pa bco brgyad khongs su yang / /gtogs pa med pas ma yin nges/ /gzugs la sogs la dmigs pa'i blo/ /rang rig

nyid du yod pas kyang / /mngon sum gnod pa gang yin des/ /skye med smra ba de la gnod/ /srid pa rnams ni de nyid du/ /skye med ces bya'i khyad par gyis/ /mngon sum dang ni grags pa dag /gnod pa 'di la med ce na/ /bgrod min la yang yang dag tu/ /bgrod par bya ste

bud med phyir/ /bud med gzhan bzhin zer ba yi/ /skyon bcas tshig kyang skyon med 'gyur/ /bden pa mthong ba de nyid min/ /de nyid med par thal bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i lha yis bstan pa ltar/ /de nyid yin par mi 'dod do/ /phyi rol skye mched yod pa las/ /

der snang ba yi blo 'byung bas/ /yod par rigs te sems nyid ni/ /yod la dga' ba ji bzhin gyis/ /gal te sems yod mi 'dod na/ /khyod kyi 'gro ba sems tsam min/ /'gro ba phyogs su bya ba dang / /gtan tshigs bsgrub pa khyod la med/ /de la sngar smras rigs

pa ni/ /rang gi phyogs nyams dogs pas gzhan/ /mi 'dod gyur pa gang smra ba/ /de ni rigs pa ma yin no/ /ston pa'i rnam par mi rtog blo/ /bdag med pa la dmigs par 'dod/ /yul can gyi ni blo yin phyir/ /gang zag bdag med pa bzhin no/ /sbyor

las byung sogs blo dag ni/ /'byung ba gal te 'gog byed na/ /shes bya kun du ma grub pas/ /blo gang gang gi rjes 'byung ba/ /de ni rtog med sngon byang chub/ /shes bya de nyid ma log phyir/ /de yi ngo bo rnam rtog sogs/ /bral ba'i blor ni mngon 'dod pas/ /

de yi rten ni 'gog byed na/ /grub pa nyid ni rab sgrub byed/ /de ni zhi nyid sogs bstan pa/ /rtog pa rnams kyis sgro btags pa'o/ /mthong ba med pa rtog med pa/ /brjod pa med pa byed med pa/ /'tsho ba med pa rtsom med pa/ /de bzhin dga' med

gnas med pa/ /de tshe lam ni de nyid kyis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'dod phyir bdag /grub pa sgrub pa'i skyon yang yin/ /bsgom nyid la yang btag par bya/ /ji ltar lung dang mi 'gal bar/ /rjes su dpag pa'i rjes 'brangs pa/ /'di ltar de nyid bsgom pa ste/ /

de ni de bzhin mkhas pas 'dod/ /gang gis de rtogs te sangs rgyas/ /gzhan ni mi yi la du mtshungs/ /theg chen sangs rgyas gsung min zhes/ /zer ba 'di yang gtan la dbab/ /sngar bstan pa yi lam 'di yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob mi nus/ /sdug bsngal

rnam par rtogs byed phyir/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bzhin/ /rjes su dpag pas gnod pa yang / /gzhan gyi phyogs la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dpe ni ma grub pa nyid kyang / /de la zhugs pa bzlog par dka'/ /mi skye zad par shes pa ni/ /ji bzhin don gyi don dam min/ /

'khrul bzhin rnam rtog bcas pa'i phyir/ /de rtogs ji ltar de nyid yin/ /theg pa gzhan nyid rgyu yin zhes/ /zer ba de yi lan yang btab/ /ji ltar sgrib pa yod bzhin du/ /dgra bcom mya ngan 'da' bar rigs / /ma rig nyon mongs can spangs pas/ /de ni grol gyur

sangs rgyas bzhin/ /de ni mi bden med pa'i phyir/ /dngos dang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas la/ /yang dag tu na theg chen gyi / /lam gyi sangs rgyas byang chub dag /sgrub min rtog bcas mtshan bcas phyir/ /'jig rten pa yi lam bzhin no/ /ji srid 'ga' zhig skrag

pa yis/ /thag pa la ni sbrul zhes 'khrul/ /'khri shing bsdogs par shes pa ni/ /gnyen po'i phyogs kyis shes par 'byung / /des na gtan tshigs ma nges bcas/ /rgol ba'i smra ba spangs pa yin/ /kun nas nyon mongs gnyen po'i phyir/ /'dis ni lan yang btab pa

byas/ /theg chen sangs rgyas gsung yin te/ /bdag med la sogs ston pa dang / /dkon mchog gsum gyi bdag nyid che/ /ston phyir slob ma'i theg pa bzhin/ /phyir rgol tshad mas gnod pa'i phyir/ /de yi gtan tshigs ma grub nyid/ /bla ma kun dga' pa ta li/ /

sdug bsngal phung po sa pa dang / /'char byed stong pa 'char ba dang / /gang po spangs pa ram pa dang / /mya ngan 'das dang yul 'khor skyong / /zhes bya gzhan yang 'gro ba'i mdo/ /rtsa ba'i sdud par ma tshang bas/ /rgyas pa min par rtogs par bya/ / yang dag lta ba sngon 'gro ba/ /

gang phyir theg chen las gsungs pa/ /de phyir gtan tshigs ma grub nyid/ /sdug bsngal skye ba bkag bstan pas/ /ma skye sdug bsngal yin mi 'dod/ /skyes pa sdug bsngal ngo bo na/ /de stong ci'i phyir khas mi len/ /'dus byas yin phyir sgyu ma'am/ /zag med phung po ji

bzhin no/ /khyod ci sdug bsngal bden 'dod pa/ /yang dag lta ba'i blos 'dod pa/ /tshor ba sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yin/ /skye sogs sdug bsngal nyid ji ltar/ /mi rtag phyir na sdug bsngal na/ /rgyu dang lam yang sdug bsngal nyid/ /sdug bsngal rgyu yin phyir zhe na/ /kun

'byung sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal nyid ni tshig tsam phyir/ /de shes ji ltar sdug bsngal shes/ /sdug bsngal yul can shes pa de / /de nyid du na bden pa min/ /sdug bsngal nyid du de shes phyir/ /phung sogs sdug bsngal blo bzhin no/ /rgyu ni sdug

bsngal rgyu nyid du/ /mi rigs kun 'byung bdag nyid phyir/ /ral gris gshags sogs bzhin du'am/ /sems byung yin phyir lam bzhin no/ /sdug bsngal rgyu yi yul can gyi/ /blo de brdzun pa nyid du 'dod/ /rgyu sogs rnam par rtog pa'i phyir/ /sdug bsngal rgyu yi

blo can bzhin/ /skye med 'gag pa yod min te/ /sngar smras pa yi dgag pa nyid/ /skyes pa 'gag na ma skyes la/ /nam mkha'i me tog bzhin mi rigs/ /gang tshe skyes pas de ma skyes/ /'gog pa nyid kyis 'gog yin par/ /mi 'dod de tshe mkhas pa khyod/ /

ci zhig bden pa yod par smros/ /ma skyes pa yi 'gog pa yang / /yang dag tu na 'gog pa min/ /ma skyes pa yi 'gog yin phyir/ /so sor brtags min 'gog pa bzhin/ /'gog pa'i ngo bo nyid med na/ /khyod kyi lam gyis ci zhig

len/ /ma skyes lam yang ji ltar yin/ /gang gis ci zhig thob par byed/ /lam gyis ngan grol thob min te/ /'dus byas yin phyir gzhan bzhin nam/ /'gog pa la ni dmigs pa'i phyir/ /de las gzhan pa'i 'gog pa bzhin/ /spyi la dmigs pa yin phyir

ram/ /'dus byas yin phyir de bzhin du/ /sdug bsngal la sogs mthong ba brdzun/ /brdzun pa'i shes pa bzhin du 'dod/ /'dis ni yang dag rtog pa dang / /rtsol ba sogs kyang brdzun nyid phyir/ /lam gyi bden pa don dam du/ /mi bden par ni grub pa yin/ /des

na bsgom de mi rigs la/ /sdug bsngal la sogs ma mthong rigs/ /mthong ba rnams kyis ma mthong gzugs/ /thams cad du yang de bzhin gnas/ /gal te blo ngan 'ba' zhig ni/ /bden pa mthong ba mi 'dod phyir/ /khyod ni thar par rigs min te/ /byis pa'i

skye bo bzhin zhe na/ /sdug bsngal des sdug ma skyes phyir/ /su zhig thar pa gang la 'dod/ /grol ba'ang sgyu ma byas pa bzhin/ /'khrul pa'i dbang gis bstan pa yin/ /sdug bsngal la sogs gang dag rnams/ /gtan du ma mthong grol bar 'dod/ /de

phyir dpe yang yod min la/ /de bzhin gtan tshigs ma grub nyid/ /yang dag lta ba sngon 'gro ba'i/ /ji ltar 'byung ba'i lam 'di nyid/ /theg chen du yang nyer bstan pas/ /de phyir gtan tshigs ma grub nyid/ /bden pa gnyis la nyer brten nas/ /sangs rgyas

rnams kyis chos bsten te/ /'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa dang / /don dam nyid kyi bden pa'o/ /rig byed mtha' yang legs bstan gang / /de kun sangs rgyas gsungs pa yin/ /de phyir dpe ni ma grub ste/ /the tshom za na brtag par gyis/ /yod dang med pa'i rtog

bral zhing / /shes rab spyod pas gnas pa la/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu skur 'debs pa'i/ /lta ba gang yod 'dod pa gang / /rgyu dang 'bras bu 'brel pa dag /'jig rten grags pa ji lta bar/ /de bzhin de ni 'gog pa min/ /de phyir gtan tshigs ma grub nyid/ /dngos po

mngon sum spyod yul gyi/ /kun rdzob byis pas gzung ba 'di/ /'dir ni lan yang snga ma bzhin/ /de yi gnod pas mi gnod do/ /mkhas pa'i lugs kyis brtags pa la/ /grags pas gnod pa ma yin te/ /ji ltar chos bdag med pa dang / /skad cig ma zhes brjod pa

bzhin/ /gzugs kyi de nyid byis rnams kyi / /yul nyid 'gyur ba ma yin te/ /nang la rig pa ma sbyangs phyir/ /bdag sogs stong pa ji bzhin no/ /byis rnams blo la yang dag tu/ /gzugs kyi de nyid ldan pa min/ /ma rig rab rib kyis bsgribs phyir/ /mya ngan

'das pa'i spyod yul bzhin/ /srid pa rnams ni yang dag tu/ /skye med ces bya'i khyad par gyis/ /mngon sum dang ni grags pa dag /gnod pa bstan pas gnod pa med/ /yang dag par na chos rnams ni/ /zhi zhing mkha' dang mnyam pa la/ /bud med nyid kyang ma grub

na/ /dpe yi gnod par ji ltar 'dod/ /bgrod bya bgrod pa bgrod po dang / /gsum po ji ltar yod bzhin du/ /bgrod min bgrod par sgrub byed pa/ /de bzhin skyon zhig 'dogs par 'dod/ /grags pas gnod pa nyid ni bden/ /khyad par can la ma grub phyir/ /des na

mi mthun phyogs 'di la/ /bdag gi phyogs gnod nus pa med/ /spros pa med cing rang rig la/ /rnam rtog dri ma dang bral ba/ /du ma nyid dang gcig nyid bral/ /zhi ba de nyid mkhas rig pa/ /nam mkha'i lha yis bstan pa nyid/ /de nyid yin par mi rigs kyang / /tshangs

pa dang po'i lha las byung / /lha de la gus de skad smra/ /gzugs sogs skye mched snang ba nyid/ /blo yi yul du 'dod pa yin/ /de yi yod pa thun mong nyid/ /bsgrub bya zhe na nga yang 'dod/ /'byung las gyur sogs ngo bo yi/ /gzugs sogs skye mched yod nyid ni/ /bsgrub bya'o

zhe na dpe yang med/ /phyir rgol rtog ges gnod pa'ang yod/ /gzugs sogs skye mched 'byung ba dang / /'byung ba las gyur mtshan nyid min/ /rang bdag rnam par snang ba'i blo/ /skyed pa'i rgyu phyir yid bzhin no/ /sems dang sems byung ngo

bo nyid/ /sems dang sems byung rab tu grags/ /gtan tshigs dang ni dpe yang med/ /phyogs kyang rnal 'byor pa la med/ /rnam shes tsam zhes bya ba 'dir/ /phyi rol don ni bzlog pa'i phyir/ /tshig don 'di ni de spong zer/ /bdag gi phyogs nyams ji ltar 'dod/ /

'ga' yi tshig gis smrar med par/ /bya bar mi nus zhi ba'i blo/ /snying po yod dam snying po med/ /mkhas pas de la dpyad par gyis/ /dbu ma'i snying po las nyan thos kyi de kho na nyid la 'jug pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //rang gi lugs kyi nga rgyal gyis / /mkhas

par rlom gzhan 'di skad smra/ /de nyid bdud rtsir 'jug pa dang / /rnal 'byor spyod pas legs bstan zer/ /dngos po gnyis po med pa'i phyir/ /gnyis dngos med pa'i yod pa ni/ /yod la sogs pa'i blo yi yul/ /dam pa'i don du 'dod do lo/ /med pa'i dngos po

bdag med pa/ /de bzhin nyid dang chos gnas dang / /rnam par mi rtog blo'i gzung ste/ /de shes par ni bya ba yang / /dmigs pa la ni brten byas nas/ /mi dmigs pa ni rab tu skye/ /mi dmigs pa la brten byas nas/ /mi dmigs pa ni rab tu skye/ /brtags

pa nye bar mi dmigs shing / /gzhan gyi dbang yang gzung med pas/ /de nyid mthong ba yongs grub pa'i/ /ngo bo nyid la blta ba yin/ /brtags pa rgyu mtshan bcas phyir dang / /gzhan du gnyis po med phyir dang / /kun nas nyon mongs dmigs pa'i phyir/ /gzhan dbang yod

pa nyid du 'dod/ shes rab pha rol phyin tshul 'di/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid thob pa yin/ /skye dang 'gag la sogs pa dag /dgag pa lhur len ma yin no/ /'dir bshad de bzhin gshegs bka' kun/ /kho bo cag gi tshad ma yin/ /tshad ma yid ches lung yin

phyir/ /bzang po dag ni sgrub par byed/ /lung gzhan dag gis the tshom dang / /log pa'i blo can gzhan mi byed/ /de phyir de dag sgrub gzhug phyir/ /rigs pa ldan pa'i tshul btsal bya/ /gnyis med pa yi dngos po ni/ /rigs pa ma yin 'gal ba'i phyir/ /nam

mkha'i me tog med dngos sam/ /de dngos yin par brtag mi bya/ /gal te yang dag brtags med phyir/ /de la dbye ba med snyam na/ /mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid rnam bzhag la/ /de ni mtshungs phyir lan ma yin/ /gal te de dngos ma btang gang / /de ni de dngos yin

'dod na/ /de ltar dngos nyid mi gtong ba/ /de phyir de ni dngos ma yin/ /des na de nyid gzigs rnams kyi/ /mkhyen pa dngos med dmigs par 'gyur/ /de yang chos bdag med yin te/ /med pa'i blo yi rgyu phyir ro/ /gal te dngos med dmigs pa'i blo/ /

rnam par mi rtog yin 'dod na/ /des na gzugs blo mi rtog pa'ang / /dam pa yin pa nyid du gyur / /gal te gzung bar snang 'dod pas/ /gzugs blo yang dag ma yin na/ /des na gtan tshigs 'khrul 'gyur zhing / /dam bcas pa yang nyams par 'gyur/ /ngo bo

nyid la dmigs yin na/ /ston pa'i byang chub rtog can dang / /dmigs pa can du 'gyur ba dang / /rnam par mi rtog blor mi 'gyur/ /sems tsam du ni dmigs pa dang / /gzugs la sogs pa mi 'dzin na/ /khas blangs pa dang grags pa yis / /dam bcas pa la gnod

par 'gyur/ /de ltar snang ba skye ba'i phyir/ /rmi lam gzugs sogs blo bzhin du/ /gzugs la sogs pa don med par/ /rnam par shes zhes byar mi rung / /gang phyir rmi lam la sogs pa'i/ /rnam shes chos la dmigs pa'i phyir/ /de phyir dpe yang med pa

dang / /yul la skur pa 'debs par 'gyur/ /gal te yul du snang ba nyid/ /sems kyi dmigs pa yin 'dod na/ /yul du snang ba ma gtogs par/ /sems kyi bdag nyid gzhan ci yod/ /gzhan ltar skyes phyir de gnyis snang / /shel dang 'dra bar mi 'dod de/ /

nye bar bzhag las der skye bas/ /shel gyi skad cig min phyir ro/ /de 'gags gzhan ni skyes pa la/ /de yi blo ni 'khrul par 'dod/ /gnyis su snang med nus pa ni/ /tha dad min phyir yul snang bzhin/ /sems ni rang dang gzhan snang ba/ /

lhan cig 'dra bar 'byung ba'i phyir/ /gzugs brnyan bzhin du mi 'dod de/ /de phyir gnyis su snang ma yin/ /gal te tshad ma 'bras yod phyir/ /gnyis su snang bar 'dod ce na/ /gzhan du'ang de dag 'grub pa'i phyir/ /rtog pa de yang mi 'dod do/ /yul du snang ba 'dzin

pa yi / /rnam par shes pa skye bzhin pas/ /gzhal bya gang yin 'jal byed pa/ /des na de ni tshad mar 'dod/ /bstan du med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /de bzhin rtogs pa gang thob pa/ /gal te smra 'dod bsgrub bya ba/ /phyi don sems kyi dngos nyid de/ /rnam par shes pa'i

yul yin phyir/ /dper na de ma thag bzhin na/ /des na sems byung so so yis / /gtan tshigs 'khrul pa nyid du 'gyur/ /mdo las sems tsam gsungs pa ni/ /byed po za po dgag phyir ro/ /gal te rnam brtags don mthong bas/ /rnam par shes pa

sgrub byed na/ /brtags pa ma yin don yod phyir/ /yul med par ni mi 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam la yang brtags min pa'i/ /ngo bo nyid blos ma nges 'gyur/ /dmigs pa med par mi 'dod de / /dpe ni rab tu ma grub phyir/ /ci ste blo yul rnam gnyis te/ /gcig dang

'dus pa yin snyam na/ /rigs pas yongs su brtags pa na/ /de ni gnyi gar mi rigs so/ /de la gzugs rdul gcig pu ni/ /gzugs blo'i spyod yul ma yin te/ /de snang nyid du mi 'gyur phyir/ /dbang gzugs spyod yul ma yin bzhin/ /phra rab gzugs ni du

ma de/ /sems kyi spyod yul yin mi 'dod/ /rdzas su yod pa ma yin phyir/ /dper na zla ba gnyis bzhin no/ /de la gal te pha rol po/ /bsags pa min pa'i gzugs sems kyis/ /spyod yul min par sgrub byed na/ /der ni grub pa nyid sgrub 'gyur/ /ci ste

bsags pa'i gzugs la ni/ /gtan tshigs ma grub nyid 'gyur te/ /gzugs gzhan dag gis bsags pa ni/ /der snang blo ni skye phyir ro/ /de ni dmigs nyid yin 'dod de/ /der snang blo yi rgyur 'gyur phyir/ /'dod chags bzhin te de yi phyir/ /khyod dam bcas

la rjes dpag gnod/ /gal te rang blo dmigs med de/ /rang gi sa bon las skye'i phyir/ /yid blo bzhin 'dod brtags min phyir/ /khyod kyi dmigs bcas nyid du 'gyur/ /dmigs pa med pa rjes dpog pas/ /de ni blo nyid ma yin 'gyur/ /'dus pa dam ni

ma bcas pas/ /de 'gog pa ni gnod pa med/ /mi rtog blo ni spang min te/ /'phags phyir rnam par mi rtog phyir/ /de skye thar pa ga la yod/ /de yi sa bon ma bcom phyir/ /gnyis kyi 'du shes 'jug pa na/ /sna tshogs snang ba rab tu skye/ /de yi sna tshogs

snang gang dang / /de rang sa bon las skye'i phyir/ /zha ba de la nus phul dang / /rang bdag nyid dang gzhan las so/ /rnam par shes pa'i ming gis ni/ /de la bdag tu btags par 'gyur/ /gnyis yod sgyu ma lta bu dang / /zad can ma zhi bdag med dang / /gnyis

med mi zad yang dag dang / /'chi med go 'phang mchog rtogs nas/ /de la 'dra ba med pa'i phyir/ /rnam par rtog pa rnam ldog pas/ /mi rtog blos ni dmigs byas pa'i/ /grol ba khyad par med par 'gyur/ /yang na sems tsam bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /sems las byung

rnams sems las ni/ /tha dad med par khas blang bya/ /yang na rnam rig tsam mi 'grub/ /yang na tshor sogs 'dus pa la/ /sems su gdags par 'dod par gyis/ /des na gzhan gyi rjes smra dang / /rang gi gzhung yang btang bar 'gyur/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang

las/ /gal te sems ni rdzas 'dod na/ /tshor sogs de bzhin skye ba'i phyir/ /de grub pas na gnod pa med/ /ut+pal rtsa ba nus mang las/ /lo ma la sogs rgyun 'byung ltar/ /de bzhin sems rdzas med pa las/ /rgyun rnams sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gnyen pos

skye bar mi 'gyur zhing / /byed rgyu yod na skye bar 'gyur/ /'di las sna tshogs skyes la sogs/ /brtags pa mi 'dod rdzas med phyir/ /de la dmigs pas mi 'grol te/ /blo 'gag med pa'ang ma yin pas/ /de phyir kun rdzob don dam du'ang / /

bdag tu smra dang 'dra mi 'gyur/ /gzugs la sogs pa stong pa ste/ /ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes phyir/ /rdzas su med phyir 'jig pa'i phyir/ /sgyu ma bzhin goms chags med 'gyur/ /gzugs la sogs pa yod kyang ni/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs gyur pa/ /de yod

ma yin de yi tshe/ /log 'dzin ci phyir mi ldog 'gyur/ /gnyis su rnam par rtog pa dag /sems dang sems byung spyod yul na/ /gzugs la sogs pa dgag byas kyang / /'jug par mi 'gyur mi rigs so/ /gal te de ni dgag pa'i phyir/ /sgrub gzhan yongs su

'dzin 'dod na/ /'dam rdzab 'khru bar byed pa bas/ /ma reg par ni bsrings na bzang / /kun brtags yod pa ma yin te/ /btags phyir sbrul dang 'drar mi 'dod/ /thag pa'i dngos por ma nges phyir/ /yang na grags pas gnod par 'gyur/ /de ni 'khrul min

gang gi phyir/ /du ma'i cha de mthong phyir ro/ /khyod ni dngos la skur 'debs 'gyur/ /rnam pa kun tu yul 'gog phyir/ /de med par yang kun nyon mongs/ /ming las don 'jug las 'byung min/ /smra mi shes pa'i dud 'gro yang / /nyon mongs skye ba mthong

phyir ro/ /gzugs ni gzugs kyi ngo bos stong / /gzugs zhes brjod la ltos bcas par/ /gzugs blo skye bar 'gyur phyir zhes/ /brtag pa bzod par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs ni stong nyid mi rigs te/ /gzugs min bdag nyid rnam bcas pa'i/ /dngos

por snang blo spyod yul gyi / /gzugs kyi bdag nyid de yod phyir/ /mngon par brjod bya spyi yin na/ /spyi ni ci yang yod min pas/ /des na mngon brjod bdag nyid kyis/ /stong pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro/ /brjod bya spyi ldan dngos po de/ /der snang blo yi rgyu yin phyir/ /de ni de

bdag nyid yod pas/ /brjod med nyid du mi rigs so/ /rigs mi mthun pas stong nyid de/ /blo mthun 'jug pa'i rgyu yin phyir/ /rigs mthun pa la mthun pas na/ /spyi zhes bya bar nges pa yin/ /gzhi ma bzung na gzung med de/ /de bzung gzung du yod pa'i phyir/ /grangs

bzhin des na dngos de ni/ /brtag bya brjod par 'dod gzhan min/ /dbyer med phyir na gcig pa dang / /rdzas med phyir na du mar 'jug /de nyams na yang mi nyams phyir/ /gzhan la'ang de 'dod ma yin min/ /sngon min ut+pal ma yin pa/ /med pa'i dngos pos ma bsal

bas/ /gzhi mthun ldan pa nyid yin te/ /gnyi ga don gcig 'jug phyir ro/ /gzhan sel gzhan gyi spyi ma yin/ /chos gzhan yin phyir khyad par bzhin/ /lkog shal la sogs blo dbye med/ /med la khyad par med phyir ro/ /dngos ma bzung bar de 'dzin phyir/ /brtag bya brjod

min yin mi 'dod/ /de yi sgo nas gzhan brjod na/ /de ni brjod bya'i nyid sogs nyams/ /de ni gzhan gyi ngo bo na/ /des na brjod med nyid mi rigs/ /de phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa yi/ /tshul gyis smra ba mi rigs so/ /dngos rnams ngo bo nyid med de/ /mngon brjod bdag nyid stong phyir

ro/ /de nyid kyis de skye med phyir/ /ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags nyid/ /gang phyir mngon brjod ldan dngos ni/ /ji ltar brjod pa de ltar med/ /de phyir chos rnams dngos med nyid/ /ces bya la sogs gang smras dang / /gzhan dbang yod pa nyid smras pa/ /kun rdzob tu ni grub

pa sgrub/ /gal te don dam dpe med cing / /gtan tshigs 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur/ /gal te gzhan dbang ngo bo nyid/ /skye ba ngo bo nyid med de/ /yod par gyur las ma skyes na/ /skye 'gag la sogs 'gal sgrub yin/ /rkyen rnams las ni gang skyes pa/ /de skye med par

thub pas gsungs/ /don dam du na dngos nyid las/ /de yi skye ba dgag phyir ro/ /chos rnams yang dag nyid min phyir/ /de dag kun rdzob blo dang sgra/ /sna tshogs rang spyi'i spyod yul du/ /'gyur ba la ni 'gal ba med/ /ming ni gang dang gang dag gis/ /chos rnams

gang dang gang brjod pa/ /de la de ni yod min pa/ /de ni chos rnams chos nyid do/ /ci ste rkyen 'byung ngo bo yis/ /gzhan gyi dbang las skye 'dod na/ /rgyu bzhin yang dag nyid min pas/ /'dod pa sgrub par byed pa yin/ /gzhan gyi dbang

yang gzung med pa/ /ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes 'dod/ /don dam du ni skyes pa la/ /log par snang ba mi rigs phyir/ /gal te ji ltar snang ba ltar/ /der snang bdag nyid yod gyur na/ /ji ltar snang ba der yod phyir/ /chos rnams ji ltar sgyu ma bzhin/ /ma skyes pa dang ma

'gags dang / /dngos med ngo bo nyid med pa'ang / /yod pa nyid las ma skyes dang / /rdzas su yod pa ma yin phyir/ /gdags pa skyon chags nyid med de/ /rnam rig tsam du mtshungs phyir ro/ /spang dang spong byed yod pa'i phyir/ /yongs shes sogs yod gang gir 'dod/ /

de ni gang phyir rdzas med kyang / /rnam rtog bral bas thar par 'gyur/ /rdzas yod nyid na'ang skye med phyir/ /'di las bzhin du brtag mi 'dod/ /dngos rnams ngo bo nyid med na/ /gdags pa'ang yod par mi 'gyur bas/ /de ni med par lta ba dag /mi gleng bstan par bya

min dang / /rang yang ngan song gzhol ba dang / /gzhan yang phung bar byed pa yin/ /zhe sdang sha rul sgregs pa 'di/ /nga rgyal ma zhu ston pa yin/ /chos rnams sgyu ma bzhin 'dod de/ /ngo bo nyid ni med phyir dang / /byis pa rmongs pa'i rgyu phyir dang / /ma byung ba las

'byung phyir ro/ /rnam par mi rtog dngos po ni/ /mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid mi rigs/ /rnam rtog 'du shes sna tshogs kyi/ /go skabs rab tu 'byed phyir ro/ /skyes pa brjod med nyid mi rigs/ /dgag pa gong du bstan phyir ro/ /brjod du med nyid yin gyur na'ang / /

kun rdzob la ni de nyid nor/ /de la de nyid gzhan med phyir/ /gal te de nyid mthong 'dod na/ /bum la'ang bum pa gzhan med pas/ /ci phyir de nyid mthong mi 'dod/ /khyod kyi tshul skyon sba phyir gyi/ /de ni nyon mongs byang mi 'gyur/ /gser la sogs pa rkyen rnams kyi/ /

rjes su 'gyur ba yin phyir ro/ /nam mkha' rtag tu rnam dag ste/ /mig ni dag dang ma dag pas/ /dri bcas dri med mkha' 'dod dang / /chos rnams chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ma dag la sogs blo 'khrul te/ /byed pa'i chos yin las kyi min/ /de la dmigs pa dag

ma yin/ /de nyid dmigs byar mi 'dod do/ /de nyid rdzas su yod yin na/ /skyon ni snga ma bzhin du 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'das pa rnam mi rtog /de blor mi 'dod 'jig phyir ro/ /de srid shes pa dmigs yod pa/ /de srid shes bya'i rjes 'jug nyid/ /thams cad mkhyen

nyid cig car min/ /shes pa rang la 'jug pa ni/ /med phyir ral gri'i so bzhin dang / /rang rig 'gog par byed phyir ro/ /rnam par mi rtog 'phags blo'i gzung / /rnam pa kun tu brjod med nyid/ /sngar bzhin skye ba bkag pa'i phyir/ /skye med rdzas su yod min phyir/ /

yod dang med pa'i dngos nyid kyi/ /ngo bo don dam nyid yin na/ /sgro 'dogs pa dang skur mtha' las/ /grol ba khyod la ji ltar yod/ /yod min de nyid skye med phyir/ /med min de yod ma yin phyir/ /yod dang med pa gnyis spangs pas/ /de 'dod de phyir gnyis su

med/ /ston pa dmigs med mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i phyir/ /byang chub mnyam nyid mi 'gyur te/ /de nyid rang snang tha dad phyir/ /de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i blo/ /nus pa ma bzhag ga las 'byung / /nam mkha'i me tog snang ba'i blo/ /nus pa ma

bzhag mi rigs bzhin/ /rang tshul sbed pas khyod kyis ni/ /de nyid gcig nyid gzhan mi 'grol/ /rdzas med dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ /nged la ji skad smras de rigs/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba'ang skye med pas/ /khyad par med phyir ma gos phyir/ /shin tu brjod du med nyid

kyang / /blos ni rnam kun gzung med phyir/ /skye ba rab rib bral ba'i blo/ /'jig rten 'das pa yin par 'dod/ /'jig rten las sgrol don phyir dang / /'jig rten shin tu 'da' phyir ro/ /de ni mi rtogs dmigs med dang / /mtshan ma med cing de yis ni/ /rang gzhan chos nyid

cig char du/ /rtogs med tshul gyis mnyam nyid rtogs/ /chos rnams skye ba med pa ni/ /chos bdag med pa nyid ces bya/ /de la rtog dri'i mtshan ma dag /'byung ba med pa snga ma bzhin/ /gal te de nyid rtog ge yi/ /spyod yul min phyir rjes dpag

pas/ /de mi rtogs pa de yi phyir/ /chos rnams chos nyid brtag min na/ /'di la rjes dpag skyon med pa/ /lung gis rjes su sgrub byed pas/ /brtags pa'i rnam rtog chu bo dag /sna tshogs ma lus bsal mdzad nas/ /sangs rgyas rnam rtog mi mnga' ba/ /dgongs pa

mkha' mnyam ye shes kyi/ /shes bya mtha' dag ji bzhin du/ /chos rnams bzhag pa nyid rtogs shing / /ming la sogs pa thob pa nyid/ /des na rjes su dpag pa'i yul/ /de nyid yin par sgrub mi nus/ /de nyid shes pa'i mi mthun phyogs/ /gang yin de ni des zlog byed/ /
